hypo: This is one of the important skill certificates in addition to my driver's license!

src: 普及一下：急救措施其实是做发生突发事件时候的应急救援，即在救护车来之前的抢救。
tgt: For your information: first aid measures refer to emergency rescue in emergencies, i.e., emergency treatment conducted before the coming of the ambulance.
hypo: Emergency treatment is actually emergency rescue in the event of sudden incidents, that is, rescue before the ambulance arrives.

src: 众所周知，在事故发生后救护车来的过程中其实是还有一段时间的，而正是这段时间才是最关键的。
tgt: As everyone knows, there is a period before the coming of the ambulance after the accident happens, which is most critical.
hypo: As is well known, in the process of rescue vehicles arriving after an accident, there is actually a certain period of time, and this period is the most critical.

src: 这个时候便是需要急救的时候。
tgt: This period is the most important time for first aid.
hypo: This is the time for emergency.

src: 如果我真的发生了心脏病、脑溢血、呼吸骤停，那么我们生命的窗口只有四分钟，黄金四分钟！
tgt: If we suffer from heart attack, cerebral hemorrhage or respiratory arrest, our life window is only four minutes, the golden four minutes!
hypo: If I really suffered from heart disease, cerebral hemorrhage, respiratory arrest, then our life window is only four minutes, golden four minutes!

src: 所以身边的人懂得急救是多么重要呀！
tgt: So it is very important for those around us to know first aid!
hypo: Therefore, those around me know how important emergency preparedness is!

src: 当我们身边有人倒下的时候，我们可以通过专业的知识去对他进行抢救，而不是傻傻地站在那里一动不动什么也做不了，这种无助的感觉太让人感到可怕了。
tgt: When somebody falls down, we can conduct first aid with our professional knowledge, instead of doing nothing and only standing there; this helpless feeling is really frightening.
hypo: It's really frightening when somebody falls down and we can't do anything about it. Instead of standing there helplessly, we should use our professional knowledge to rescue the person.

src: “在中国，我们官方数据每年有三百万人意外死亡，最危险的叫心脏骤停。
tgt: “In China, 3 million people die from accidents every year according to official data, and the most dangerous one is known as cardiac arrest.
hypo: In China, according to official data, three million people die of sudden death every year, and the most dangerous is cardiac arrest.

src: 在美国全国是平均15%能救过来。
tgt: 15% of people of cardiac arrest can be brought back to life in the United States.
hypo: In the United States, an average of 15% are brought back to life.

src: 在拉斯维加斯的赌场酒店，百分之七八十能救过来，上海、北京低于1%。”
tgt: In the Casino Hotel in Las Vegas, 70% or 80% of them can be brought back to life, and the proportion in Shanghai and Beijing is lower than 1%. ”
hypo: At the casino hotel in Las Vegas, there is an 80% chance of survival, while in Shanghai and Beijing, the chances are less than 1%.

src: 这是第一反应创始人陆乐说的。
tgt: Said Lu Le, the founder of the First Reaction.
hypo: This is what Lu Le, the founder of Reaction, said.

src: 如果一个人发生了心脏骤停，呼吸没有了，心跳没有了，你掐人中是没有任何作用的。
tgt: Pinching philtrum has no effect at all if a person suffers from cardiac arrest and there is no sign of breathing or heartbeat.
hypo: If someone has a pinching philtrum, cardiac arrest, and there is no pulse or breathing, there is nothing you can do.

src: 必须做人工呼吸、胸外按压才有可能把人救过来。
tgt: Artificial respiration and external chest compression are required to bring them back to life.
hypo: Bringing a person back to life requires artificial respiration and chest compressions.

src: 我发现我们现在还很少人会有这种意识去学习急救，但是当事情发生的时候就来不及了，所以还是呼吁大家都去学习一下这个技能，让我们在面对突发状况的时候能够及时作出反应。
tgt: I found that very few people have the awareness to study first aid knowledge, but it will be too late once accident happens; therefore, I appeal to everyone to learn this skill, so that we can respond timely when faced with emergency situations.
hypo: I found that nowadays, not many people have the awareness to study first aid, but when accidents happen, it's too late to study. Therefore, I still call on everyone to study this skill so that we can make a timely response when facing emergency situations.

src: 说不定还能挽救一个人的生命！
tgt: We may bring somebody back to life with this skill!
hypo: If you don't say anything, you could save someone's life!

tgt: Yixin inspection shaft module brick equipment is widely applied in new-type masonry materials for municipal underground structures for coal, heating, electricity and gas.
hypo: The inspection shaft is widely applicable to new cement bricks for coal, heat, water, electricity, and gas underground construction.

src: 如：排水、储水设施的各类检查井、雨水口、方沟、化粪池及小型构筑物、桥梁翼墙等。
tgt: Foe example: various types of inspection shafts, gutter inlets, box drains, septic tanks, small-sized structures and wing walls of bridges for drainage and water storage facilities.
hypo: For example, the inspection of various types of wells for drainage, water tanks, manholes, culverts, septic tanks, and small-scale structures such as bridges and retaining walls.

src: 使用混凝土模块筑建检查井的优势在于模块的上下左右四周均为凹凸槽结构，组合砌筑形成链锁。
tgt: The advantage of building inspection shafts using concrete modules is that the four sides of the modules are of concave groove structures, which are built to form chain locks.
hypo: The advantage of using concrete modules to build inspection wells is that the modules have a ribbed structure on the top, bottom, left, and right sides, which combine to form a chain lock when assembled.

src: 井壁墙体抗剪力远优于平摩擦砌体的砌筑形式。
tgt: The shearing resistance of the shaft wall is far better than the masonry form of the flat friction of the brickwork.
hypo: Brickwork with reinforced concrete has far superior resistance compared to rammed earth construction.

src: 模块为中空结构，组合砌筑后纵向孔孔相通，横向孔孔相贯，孔芯浇注后，形成现浇混凝土网状结构，起到了二次补强和防水作用。
tgt: The modules are of hollow structure, with connected holes vertically and interpenetrated horizontally; the cast-in-place concrete mesh structure is formed after pouring of the cores of holes, playing the role of secondary reinforcement and waterproof.
hypo: The module is a hollow structure, and after the components are assembled, the horizontal and vertical pores are connected, and the pores are consistent in the horizontal direction. After the porous ceramic is injected, a reinforced concrete web-like structure is formed, which provides secondary reinforcement and waterproofing.

src: 模块纵横均设有插筋槽，横向卧筋、纵向插筋相应提高结构整体强度。
tgt: The joint bar grooves are equipped for modules vertically and horizontally; the horizontal and vertical joint bars can improve the overall strength of the structure.
hypo: The modules are equipped with insertion slots, and the horizontal and vertical beams are equipped accordingly to improve the overall strength of the structure.

src: 另外使用混凝土检查井模块砌筑出来的检查井、排水井不容易出现坍塌，下沉，漏水等现象，井壁墙体模块机械性能稳定，操作简单，成形尺寸标准。
tgt: In addition, phenomena such as collapse, sink or water leakage are rare in the inspection shafts and pumping shafts laid with concrete inspection shaft modules, with stable mechanical performance in shaft wall modules, easy operation and standard forming size.
hypo: In addition, the use of reinforced concrete to inspect shafts and wells drilled out of the inspection and discharge wells may not be prone to phenomena such as collapse, sinking, and leakage. The shaft and well walls are mechanically stable, easy to operate, and have standardized forming sizes.

src: 混凝土检查井模块砖机设备智能控制配备数据输入、输出装置一键通触摸式液晶显示监控机械操作全部过程，实现理想的人机对话、自动分析比料、密度运转、安全逻辑控制及故障诊断系统。
tgt: The concrete inspection shaft module brick equipment can automatically control the input and output of the configured data, and the one-key contact crystal display can monitor all the process of mechanical operation to realize ideal man-machine dialogue, automatic analysis on materials, density operation, safety logic control and fault diagnosis system.
hypo: The intelligent control equipment of the concrete inspection drilling module brick machine includes data input and output devices, which can touch-screen monitor the entire mechanical operation process of the ideal human-machine dialogue, automatic analysis of raw materials, density operation, safety logic control, and fault diagnosis system.

src: 井壁墙体模块机械液压系统采用单缸液压、输送，双缸液压、输送。

hypo: The modular mechanical hydraulic system adopts single-tube hydraulic pressure and delivery, and dual-tube hydraulic pressure and delivery.

src: 独立的液压集成站，避免了由于主机振动对液压系统的影响，从而保证液压系统工作的可靠性。
tgt: The independent hydraulic integration station is utilized to avoid the influences on the hydraulic system caused by vibration of the master so as to ensure reliability of the operation of the hydraulic system.
hypo: The independent hydraulic integrated station avoids the impact of main machine vibration on the hydraulic system, thereby ensuring the reliability of the hydraulic system.

src: 混凝土检查井模块砖机设备布料箱行进模箱脱模上升，储料箱门关闭，自动输送托板，全部由液压系统独立完成，从而达到减少机械的磨损和维修。

hypo: The brick equipment for the inspection and drilling module of the cement mixer is equipped with an independent hydraulic system to raise and lower the hopper, close the storage hopper door, and automatically feed the conveyor belt, thus achieving the reduction of mechanical wear and maintenance.

src: 混凝土检查井模块砖机设备采用进口电脑、电器，密封件液压件，准保设备综合性能稳定可靠。

src: 井壁墙体模块机械激振平台采用整体板钢，台面线切割合模无焊接点，使填料箱自由摆动导向，充分减少机械磨损。
tgt: The integral steel plate is adopted for the shaft wall module mechanical vibration platform, with no welding points of wire-electrode cutting mold closing of mesa, so that the stuffing box can swing and orient freely to greatly reduce mechanical abrasion.
hypo: The vibration platform of the wall module uses a full steel plate, and the cutting line of the table surface is without welding points, so that the filler box can swing freely and reduce mechanical abrasion.

src: 使模具负荷减少、填料并二合一加密振幅，采用一体化、全同步，台振、模振，确保达到振实效果。
tgt: It reduces loads of molds and reinforces vibration; integrated and full synchronization are adopted for vibration of the platform and the molds to ensure the vibration effect.
hypo: To ensure the vibration effect and reduce loads, the mold should be integrated and operated in full synchronization, with the vibration of the table and the mold.

src: 井壁墙体模块机械激振机械、电脑自动控制振幅根据原料性价比调节振幅，无磨损制动，从而延长使用寿命，降低成本。
tgt: The shaft wall module mechanical excitation machinery and the computer automatically control the vibration range according to the cost performance of raw materials, leading to no abrasion brake; in this way, it extends the service life and reduces the cost.
hypo: The shaft wall mechanical vibration motor and computer automatic control vibration amplitude adjusts the vibration amplitude according to the material cost ratio, thereby extending the service life and reducing costs.

hypo: The wall module machinery has both automatic and manual control functions.

src: 国际橄榄油协会将橄榄油分为初榨橄榄油（Virgin Olive Oil）和精炼橄榄油（Lampante Olive Oil或Refined Olive Oil）两大类，五个级别。
tgt: The International Olive Oil Association divides olive oil into two categories, Virgin Olive Oil and Lampante Olive Oil or Refined Olive Oil, and five levels.
hypo: The International Olive Oil Council divides olive oil into two main categories: virgin olive oil (Virgin Olive Oil) and refined olive oil (Lampante Olive Oil or Refined Olive Oil), with five grades.

src: 初榨橄榄油或称为天然橄榄油，是直接从新鲜的橄榄果实中采取机械冷榨、经过过滤等处理除去异物后得到的油脂。
tgt: Virgin olive oil, also known as natural olive oil, is oil obtained from fresh olive fruit after removing foreign matters by mechanical cold pressing and filtering.
hypo: The first pressing of olive oil, also known as virgin olive oil, is obtained by mechanically cold pressing fresh olives, filtering, and removing impurities.

src: 根据酸度的不同可分为三个级别：
tgt: There are three levels according to acidity:
hypo: According to the different acidity levels, it can be divided into three levels:

src: 特级初榨橄榄油（Extra Virgin）：是最高级别、质量最高的橄榄油，是纯天然产品。
tgt: Extra Virgin: is the highest level, best quality olive oil, a pure natural product.
hypo: Extra Virgin Olive Oil: It is the highest quality and highest-grade olive oil, which is a pure natural product.

src: 口味绝佳，有淡雅怡人的植物芬芳，酸度不超过1%。
tgt: It has premium taste, a slight and pleasant plant fragrance and a acidity of less than 1%.
hypo: The plant fragrance is elegant and refreshing, with acidity not exceeding 1%.

src: 优质初榨橄榄油（Fine Virgin）：酸度稍高，但不超过2%，味道纯正、芳香。
tgt: Fine Virgin: has a slightly higher acidity of less than 2%, tastes pure and aromatic.
hypo: Fine Virgin Olive Oil: slightly higher acidity, not exceeding 2%, with a pure and fragrant taste.

src: 普通初榨橄榄油（Ordinary Virgin）：口味与风味尚可，酸度不超过3.3%。
tgt: Ordinary Virgin: taste and flavor are acceptable, with an acidity of no more than 3.3%.
hypo: Ordinary Virgin Olive Oil: Flavor and aroma remain intact, with acidity not exceeding 3.3%.

src: 精炼橄榄油是指酸度超过3.3%的初榨橄榄油精炼后所得到的橄榄油，或成为“二次油”。
tgt: Refined Olive Oil refers to olive oil obtained from the refining of virgin olive oil with an acidity of over 3.3%, also called as “secondary oil”.
hypo: Refined olive oil refers to the olive oil obtained after the initial distillation of olive oil with an acidity of over 3.3%, or becomes a "secondary oil".

src: 精炼橄榄油可分为两个级别：
tgt: Refined Olive Oil can be divided into two categories:
hypo: Refining olive oil can be divided into two categories:

src: 普通橄榄油（Olive Oil）：精炼橄榄油与一定比例的初榨橄榄油混合，以调和味道与颜色，其酸度在1.5%以下，呈透明的淡金黄色。
tgt: Olive Oil: is refined olive oil mixed with virgin olive oil in a certain proportion to adjust the taste and color, has an acidity of under 1.5% and a transparent light gold color.
hypo: Ordinary olive oil (Olive Oil): A mixture of refined olive oil and a certain proportion of virgin olive oil is used to balance taste and color, with an acidity of less than 1.5%, and has a transparent golden yellow color.

src: 精炼橄榄杂质油或橄榄果渣油（Refined Olive-Pomace Oil）：是通过溶解法从油渣中提取并经过精炼而得到的橄榄油。
tgt: Refined Olive-Pomace Oil is olive oil obtained and refined from pomace with dissolution method.
hypo: Refined Olive-Pomace Oil or Refined Olive Fruit Oil (from pomace, with dissolution): is an olive oil obtained by extracting and refining olive pomace.

src: 看过等级分类的你应该已经发现，橄榄油的酸度是一个非常重要的指标。
tgt: After reading the classification, you may find the acidity of olive oil is an important index.
hypo: If you have looked at the classification of grades, you should have noticed that the acidity of olive oil is an extremely important index.

src: 要知道，橄榄果就好像酿制葡萄酒的葡萄一样，来自不同的产区、不同橄榄果品种的橄榄果，就会出产不同标准的橄榄油。
tgt: You should know that olives are just like grapes that make wine, olives from different producing areas and different types of olives will produce olive oil of different standards.
hypo: To know that olive oil is like wine made from grapes, coming from different regions and different varieties of olives, will produce olive oil with different standards.

tgt: The Mediterranean coastal area has the most suitable soil, temperature, sunshine, air humidity, precipitation and other weather conditions for olive growth.
hypo: The area along the Mediterranean coast has the most suitable climate conditions for olive and oak tree growth, including soil, temperature, sunlight, humidity, and rainfall.

src: 橄榄油富含丰富的单不饱和脂肪酸，即油酸及亚油酸、亚麻酸，还有维生素A、维生素B、维生素D、维生素E、维生素K及抗氧化物等。
tgt: Olive oil is rich in monounsaturated fatty acids, namely oleic acid, linoleic acid, linolenic acid, vitamin A, vitamin B, vitamin D, vitamin E, vitamin K and antioxidants.
hypo: Olive oil is rich in unsaturated fatty acids such as oleic acid and linoleic acid, as well as vitamins A, B, D, E, K, and antioxidants.

src: 橄榄油被认为是迄今所发现的油脂中最适合人体营养的油。

src: 其实对于身体微胖的女孩子穿衣搭配的讲究很多。

src: 身体胖的女孩穿的裙子不能太短或太长，长度差不多在膝盖，刚好能盖住大腿胖的地方即可。
tgt: Slightly overweight girls shall wear skirts not too long or too short; they shall be of the length at around the knees, just covering the fat part of the thighs.

src: 裙子过短就会把腿上的肥胖显露出来。

src: 过长就会给人矮而胖的感觉。
tgt: Skirts that are too long will make you look short and fat.
hypo: Prolonged sitting can make people feel short and fat.

src: 如果穿出分出上中下三段来，就显得你自然增高了，就是上身、裙和长筒袜用不同的颜色，看上去就会产生一种修长的感觉 。
tgt: If you are dressed in three sections, upper, middle and lower, you will naturally look taller; that is, use different colors for upper body, skirt and stockings, and you will look taller and slimmer.
hypo: If you divide the upper, middle, and lower sections, you will naturally appear taller, which is achieved by using different colors for the shirt, skirt, and stockings, giving the appearance of a slimmer figure.

src: 其实很多深色系的衣服是微胖女孩子们的标配（这一点作者深有体会），深颜色也是掩盖你身体胖的好方法，高贵典雅的黑色短裙也是微胖女孩的首选。
tgt: In fact, a lot of darker color clothes are what slightly overweight girls all have, which the author deeply agrees; dark colors are good methods to cover fatness of your bodies; in addition, noble and elegant black short shirts are best choices for slightly overweight girls.
hypo: In fact, many deep-colored clothes are the perfect match for chubby girls (the author has a deep understanding of this). Deep-colored clothes are also the best way to hide your body fat, and elegant black shorts are the top choice for chubby girls.

src: 穿上深颜色的衣服，特别是黑色的短裙，会让人觉得你瘦一些。

src: 如果小腿很胖，你的袜子和鞋不要穿得太让人注意。

src: 越大众化越好，颜色也不要太鲜艳了。

src: 以免人们对你的腿部和脚部注意时，让人得到肥胖的感觉。

src: 对于微微稍胖的女孩子一定要讲就好穿衣搭配的诀窍。
tgt: Slightly overweight girls shall master the tricks for clothing matching.

src: 微胖女孩千万不要穿紧身的短裙，另外上衣不要过短或者塞在裙子里，会让人看了很不舒服，如果腿粗的话，要穿黑色的长筒袜或者网格袜(细格子的那种哦)，选择质地柔软的印花喇叭裙，搭配一件荡领的上衣，可以很好的掩盖胖女孩的不足。
tgt: Slightly overweight girls shall never wear close-fitting short skirts and the upper outer garment shall not be too short or tucked inside the skirt, which seem strange; slightly overweight girls with thicker legs shall wear black stockings or mesh stockings (thin meshes), a flare skirt with print pattern and soft texture, and a loose-collar upper outer garment to cover the defects of the body.
hypo: Don't wear a tight-fitting short skirt if you're slightly overweight, and make sure not to tuck your shirt into the skirt, as it will make you look very uncomfortable. If you have a flare, wear black knee-length socks or a grid-patterned sock (the kind with small squares) to cover up your thighs. Choose a soft, flowy floral maxi skirt, pair it with a loose-collar blouse, and wear a cardigan to cover up any lumps and bumps.

src: 红牌威士忌喝法是什么？
tgt: How to drink Johnnie Walker Red Label whisky?
hypo: What is the Hangover Cure Whiskey?

src: 每个人的爱好不同，有人喜欢收藏，有人喜欢美食，当然也有人喜欢品酒，红牌威士忌是目前各个国家最畅销的苏格兰威士忌之一，而且红牌威士忌曾获国际洋酒大赛金奖。
tgt: Different people have different preferences; some like to collect, some like food, and certainly some like wine tasting; Johnnie Walker Red Label is one of the fastest selling Scottish whiskies in the world and has won the gold prize of International Wine Competition.
hypo: Everyone's hobbies are different, some like to collect, some like to eat, and of course, some like to drink whiskey. Red Label is one of the most popular Scottish whiskies in various countries, and it has won the International Wine and Spirits Award.

src: 每一瓶红牌威士忌都有独特的味道，不过如果不知道如何品味它，岂不是糟蹋了它的醇香。
tgt: Each bottle of Johnnie Walker Red Label whisky has its own unique flavor, but if you don’t know how to taste it, it would be such a waste of its mellow fragrance.
hypo: Each bottle of red wine has its own unique flavor, but if you don't know how to appreciate it, you've missed out on its intoxicating aroma.

src: 那么红牌威士忌怎么喝呢？
tgt: Then how do we drink Johnnie Walker Red Label whisky?
hypo: So, how does the Red Witch drink?

src: 小编为大家简单介绍下。
tgt: I’ll introduce for you now.
hypo: Now, let me introduce to you.

src: 红牌威士忌喝法：
tgt: How to drink Johnnie Walker Red Label whisky:
hypo: Red card wushu: Make sure to include these words: How

src: 尊尼获加红牌威士忌由约35种苏格兰威士忌调配而成，具有浓郁芳香及传统苏格兰威士忌的特质，浓郁芳香中带有甘甜及烟熏香味。
tgt: Johnnie Walker Red Label whisky is blended with around 35 kinds of Scotch Whiskies, possesses rich fragrance and the characteristics of traditional Scotch whisky, with both sweetness and smoked smell in its rich fragrance.
hypo: The Johnnie Walker Red Label is a blend of around 35 different Scotch whiskies, which retains the traditional characteristics of Scotch whiskies, with a sweet and smoky flavor.

src: 入口浓醇清新，略带香草及浓烈的烟熏麦芽味道。
tgt: It is mellow and fresh in the mouth, with a slight taste of vanilla and strong smoked malt.
hypo: The initial taste is refreshing, with a slight hint of floral and tobacco notes, and a mellow aftertaste.

src: 该酒可以直接加冰饮用，或者与最喜爱的饮品混合饮用。
tgt: The wine can be drunk directly with ice or mixed with your favorite drinks.
hypo: The wine can be consumed directly or mixed with one's favorite drinks.

src: 红牌威士忌进入国内,为了适应国人的口味,红牌威士忌+可乐或雪碧或新奇士等气泡饮料成为一种经久不衰的时尚。
tgt: After Johnnie Walker Red Label whisky entered China, in order to adapt to the tastes of Chinese people, drinking Red Label whisky with bubble beverage such as Cola, Sprite or Sunkist has become an enduring fashion.
hypo: With the introduction of Red Label Wuliangye into the domestic market, in order to adapt to the taste of the local people, Red Label Wuliangye + Coca-Cola or Snow Breeze or Nescafe became a long-lasting trend.

src: 这些甜味的饮料，除了可以中和酸味,在视觉上能给人带来愉悦，加入饮料,起到冲淡酒味改变口感的效果。
tgt: These sweet drinks not only can neutralize the sour taste, bring pleasure to people visually, but also can dilute the taste of wine and change the overall taste.
hypo: These sweet drinks, in addition to being able to neutralize sour tastes, can also give people visual pleasure when added to drinks, and can change the taste of alcohol to make it more refreshing.

src: 红牌威士忌+切片柠檬+方糖(砂糖亦可),是最正宗、最传统的喝法.
tgt: Red Label whisky + sliced lemon + cube sugar (granulated sugar is also acceptable) is the most authentic and traditional drinking method.
hypo: Lemon + sliced, granulated sugar is the most authentic and traditional way to drink it.

src: 正宗的红方威味道有些酸涩,加入糖可以中和其中的酸味,柠檬则会给酒带来清新的香味,当然,甜酸度可根据个人的口味爱好调配。
tgt: Authentic Red Label whisky tastes a little sour; adding sugar can neutralize the sour taste, lemon will bring fresh fragrance to the wine, and of course, the sweetness and sourness can be adjusted according to personal tastes.
hypo: The true taste of red wine is a bit sour, adding sugar can neutralize its acidity, lemon brings a fresh taste to the wine, of course, the sweetness can be adjusted according to personal preferences.

src: 以上三种都是红牌威士忌的最好喝法，大家可以作为参考尝试下，希望小编的介绍可以帮助到大家。
tgt: The above are the best drinking methods of Johnnie Walker Red Label whisky for your refence, and I hope my introduction can help you.
hypo: The above three are the best drinking methods for Wushu practitioners. Everyone can try them as references and hope that the introduction can help everyone.

src: 金夫人婚纱摄影(南街店) 暂时还没有分店
tgt: Mrs. Gold Wedding Dress Photography (Nanjie Store) has no branch store yet.
hypo: Golden Lady Wedding Photography (Nanjie Store) has not yet split into branches.

src: 拍照之前因为我们时间没安排好，更换了两次时间，顾问兰兰很耐心地帮我们安排了时间。
tgt: Because I didn’t arrange my time well before the shoot, I rescheduled twice and consultant Lanlan patiently arranged time for us.
hypo: Before taking photos, we changed the time twice because we didn't arrange the time well. However, consultant Lanlan patiently helped us arrange the time.

src: 后来选择了一个天气好的周末拍的。
tgt: Later we chose a weekend with nice weather to shoot it.
hypo: We chose a nice weekend to take pictures.

src: 金夫人的工作人员，无论是顾问，化妆师还是摄影师都超赞的。

hypo: The staff at Lady Gaga's workplace, whether they are consultants, makeup artists, or photographers, are all highly praised.

src: 那是我生平第一次正式地化妆，哇～简直不敢相信，我有一天也会变得那么好看，哈哈。

hypo: That was the first time in my life that I had my makeup done professionally, wow~ I couldn't believe how pretty I looked, haha.

src: 晓洁和另一个妹子（抱歉我记不得名字了）化妆超级有耐心，化妆也很自然。

hypo: Xiaojie and another girl (sorry, I forgot her name) were very patient with their makeup, and the makeup looked very natural.

src: 外景在江湾城拍的，幸亏那天天气很好，没有觉得很冷，拍照的时候，化妆师时不时地留意我们的衣服，头饰，稍微有一点不好了就马上帮我们整理。
tgt: We shot the outdoor scene at Jiangwancheng, and fortunately the weather was nice that day, we didn’t feel cold; during the shoot, makeup artist was paying attention to our clothes, headwear, and made adjustment immediately once there was a problem.
hypo: The outdoor scene was shot in Guangzhou, and we were fortunate to have good weather that day. We did not feel cold at all, and the makeup artist kept paying attention to our clothes, headgear, and adjusted them immediately if they were not quite right.

src: 摄影师也非常幽默，拍照一天下来都觉得很开心。
tgt: The photographer was funny, and we were happy throughout the day.
hypo: The photographer was also very humorous and felt very happy throughout the day.

src: 在选照片的时候，因为在网上看到很多案例，不愿意让客人删太多照片，但是我们选照片的时候，真的，一点没有让我们加照片的意思，直接套餐里的24张，一张都没有加（听说和我差不多时间拍婚纱照的表妹，七千多的套餐还加了一万多的照片，当时我就惊呆了，心里也很怕自己会选太多）
tgt: When choosing the photos, I saw many cases online where they wouldn’t let the customers delete too many photos, but they didn’t ask us to add photos at all, just the 24 photos in the set and nothing more (I heard that my cousin who was also taking wedding dress photos added photos worth over 10,000 in addition to the 7,000 yuan set, and I was stunned and feared I might choose too many).
hypo: When selecting photos, because there are many examples online, we don't want to delete too many photos of the wedding dress, but when we select photos, we really don't have the idea to add more photos of the wedding dress. In the package, there are 24 photos, but there is only one photo of the wedding dress. I almost fainted when I found out that there were more than 7,000 photos and more than 10,000 photos of the wedding dress.

src: 今天照片修好了，兰兰发给我，我看了有两张觉得不太好，他们立刻就帮我重新修了。
tgt: The editing was finished today and Lanlan sent it to me; I felt two were not good enough and they immediately re-edited them for me.
hypo: Today the photos were improved, Lanlan sent them to me, and I saw two that were not very good. They immediately helped me redo them.

src: 把妹妹以前拍的照片翻出来对比，我觉得我们的照片我真的太满意了，简约清新，就是我想要的风格。
tgt: I found the old photos of my sister to make comparison, and I felt that our photos were really satisfying, simple and fresh, exactly what I wanted.
hypo: I found the photos that my sister took before and compared them with our photos. I felt that our photos were really satisfied, simple and fresh, which was exactly the style I wanted.

hypo: I sincerely recommend everyone to go and take photos of Xuanhan's wedding dress!

src: 一开始是朋友介绍的因为信任，所以选择来看一下起初我的预算是7万做个基本装修。
tgt: I trusted it because my friend made the recommendation, so I chose to check it out, and originally my budget for a basic decoration was 70,000.
hypo: At first, it was my friend who introduced me because of trust, so I chose to come and take a look at my basic renovation budget of 70,000.

src: 来到店里就开始一系列的骗术。
tgt: A series of scam began as soon as I came into the store.
hypo: Once you enter the store, a series of scams will begin.

src: 我是第一次到店只是给他们看了我的户型图，他们并没有去实地量过房子，他们居然就能给我报价说我的135的房子7万是可以搞定的，大概的给我看了一下他们的材料也并不知道他们是什么品牌的材料。
tgt: When I first came to the store, I showed them my floor plan; although they didn’t really go to my apartment to take the measurement, they said they could do it within 70,000 for my 135 square meters apartment, and they showed me their materials whose brand was unclear.
hypo: I am the first time to come to the store just to show them my floor plan. They did not go to the site to measure the house. They said my 135 square meter house is worth 700,000 yuan, which is negotiable. They also showed me some of their materials, but I did not know what brand of material they were.

src: 他们的第二套骗术就是你只要到店就会拖着你把定金交了（而这个钱一旦交了你是永远退不出来，除非你有足够的经历和他们打理论战）。
tgt: The second scam was forcing you to pay the deposit, which cannot be refunded once paid, unless you have enough experience to reason with them.
hypo: Their second scam is that as soon as you enter the store, they will try to convince you to exchange your gold for cash (once you do this, the money is gone forever unless you have enough experience and can argue with them).

src: 我在犹豫要不要交定金的时候，他们就会邀请他们所谓的经理来告诉你，你今天只要把定金交了我们就能给你多少的优惠。
tgt: As I hesitated about whether to pay the deposit, they would invite their so-called manager to tell me that once I paid the deposit on that day, they could give me certain discount.
hypo: When I hesitated to pay the deposit, they would invite their so-called manager to tell me, "If you pay the deposit today, we can give you such and such a discount."

src: 这个就是一个大坑，我就是活生生被骗的例子，在头脑冲动的时候，交了一万多的定金。
tgt: This is a big swindle, and I was a victim who paid a deposit of more than 10,000 when I didn’t really think it through.
hypo: This is a big hole, and I am a victim who was really fooled. In the heat of the moment, I signed away more than a thousand fixed deposits.

src: 他给我的报价有很多问题7万不包括水电改造，不包括任何门和橱柜 浴室，而这三个就是基装的费用大头。
tgt: Their quoted price had a lot of problems; for instance, the 70,000 didn’t include water and electricity renovation, doors, cabinets or bathrooms, and these three take up a large proportion of the cost of basic installation.
hypo: There are many issues with the quoted price of $70,000. It does not include water and electricity renovation, nor any doors or cupboards in the bathroom, which are the major costs of the renovation.

src: 除去这些他们的服务点费收的也比其他家公司的高。
tgt: Apart from these, their service point fee is also higher than that of other companies.
hypo: Their point fee for services is higher than other companies.

src: 我对这个公司失去了信任，一开始什么都没有讲清楚就让我签合同。
tgt: I’ve lost trust in this company, because they asked me to sign the contract when they didn’t explain anything clearly.
hypo: I lost trust in this company, and from the beginning, they didn't make it clear what they wanted me to sign.

src: 当我去找他们退钱的时候他们表现出很有经验的样子，有专门的小团队来对付你。
tgt: When I went to ask for a refund, they acted rather experienced and sent a small team to deal with me.
hypo: When I asked them to deal with my money, they appeared very experienced, with a special team to deal with me.

src: 无论如何都会一口咬死是客户的问题他们全然无责。

hypo: Regardless, it is the customer's problem and they are fully responsible.

src: 各种推卸责任，还有很多细节，不想一一说了都是泪，总之不要选择他们，因为我朋友找他们装修的房子也是质量不好，后期给你算各种费用。
tgt: They just shrunk their responsibility in any way possible, and there were a lot more details that I don’t want to mention now; all in all, do not choose them because my friend had them renovate her apartment, and the quality was poor and they would charge you all kinds of other costs in the later stage.

src: 推荐理由:精选高粱为原料，采用传统工艺酿造，来自内蒙古高原的白酒，口感更为经典，浓香甜口，涩中带点甜，层次丰富，采用传统固态法白酒工艺，保留了其原汁原味不流失，让酒体带着浓郁又醇厚的口感。
tgt: Recommendation: Made from carefully selected sorghum, brewed using traditional procedure; baijiu from Inter Mongolian Plateau tastes more classic, rich, sweet, astringent and layered; it adopts traditional solid-state Baijiu procedure to keep its original flavor, giving it a rich and mellow taste.
hypo: Reason for recommendation: Made with high-quality wheat as raw material, crafted using traditional techniques, baijiu from Inner Mongolia's grasslands, with a more classic taste, fragrant and sweet, slightly bitter, rich in layers, using traditional solid-state fermentation, preserving its original flavor and aroma, giving the liquor a rich and full-bodied taste.

src: 浙大学术年会上学生唱主角 研究成果让人脑洞大开-新华网
tgt: Students played the leading role at the Annual Academic Conference of Zhejiang University with creative research achievements - Xinhuanet
hypo: At the annual conference of Zhejiang University, students performed as the main characters, and their research achievements left a deep impression.

src: 用空气来洗手，哈口气判断疾病，精确搜寻雾霾来源 昨天晚上，在浙江大学2016年学术年会开幕式上，一系列脑洞大开的学术成果获得表彰。
tgt: Washing hands with air, diagnosing disease through breath, and accurately seeking for source of smog; last night, a series of creative academic achievements were awarded at the opening ceremony of the 2016 Annual Academic Conference of Zhejiang University.
hypo: A series of groundbreaking academic achievements were recognized at the opening ceremony of the 2016 academic year at Zhejiang University yesterday evening.

src: 这些成果的主要研究者都是学生，研究覆盖了环境、机械、能源、医疗、生命科学、人文教育等各大领域，同学们从一个好奇的点子开始，创造出了许多具有应用价值的高端发明，其中一些项目已在国内国际获奖。
tgt: The main researchers of these achievements are students, with research covering major fields of environment, machinery, energy, medicine, life science and humanities education; students created many high-end inventions with application values from a curious idea, and some of them have won awards at home and abroad.
hypo: The main researchers of these achievements are students, who have conducted research in various fields such as environment, mechanics, energy, medicine, life sciences, humanities education, and have created many high-end inventions with practical value, some of which have won domestic and international awards.

src: 生物传感器：你的家庭体检医生
tgt: Biosensor: your home physical examination doctor
hypo: Biomedical sensors: Your family physician

src: 生物医学工程学院博士生张迪鸣团队现场展示了一个智能手机端的生物传感器，大小只有智能手机的一半。
tgt: The team of Zhang Diming, a doctoral student of School of Biomedical Engineering, showed a biosensor on the smart phone with the size of only a half of a smart phone.
hypo: Zhang Diming, a graduate student at the School of Biomedical Engineering, demonstrated a biological sensor on a smartphone at the scene, which is only half the size of a smartphone.

src: “你只需要轻轻呼一口气，这套仪器就能从你呼出的气体成分中，初步检测身体健康状况 。 ”
tgt: “All you need to do is to breathe out, and this set of instrument can detect your physical conditions preliminarily from the components of the air you breathe out.”
hypo: All you need to do is take a deep breath, and the instrument can detect your body's health status from the gas components in your breath.

src: 张迪鸣介绍说，这套传感器与智能手机相连，呼出气体后，健康报告就会显示在手机上。
tgt: Zhang Diming introduced, this set of sensor is connected to the smart phone; after you breathe out, the health report will be shown on your phone.
hypo: According to Zhang Dianming, this set of sensors is connected to a smartphone, and when gas is detected, a health report will be displayed on the phone.

src: 市场上能够检测健康状况的智能手环，一般检测的是温度、脉搏等物理参数。
tgt: Smart bands on the market which can detect health conditions often measure physical parameters such as temperature and pulse.
hypo: Smartwatches in the market can detect health conditions by measuring physical parameters such as temperature and pulse.

src: 而这套生物传感器运用了石墨烯这种新型材料，它的目标物是化学元素，敏锐的“嗅觉”让它能更深度、准确地体现身体健康状况。
tgt: This set of biological sensor uses the new material of graphene; its target is chemical elements, and its keen “sense of smell” enables it to reflect the health status of the body more in-depth and accurately.
hypo: This set of biological sensors utilizes a new type of material called stone varnish, which targets chemical elements. Its sensitive "nose" enables it to reflect the body's health status in a deeper and more accurate manner.

src: 智能手术灯：医生的高能眼睛
tgt: Smart operation lamp: high-functioning eyes for doctors
hypo: Smart surgical light: doctor's high-energy eyes

src: 除了智能手机，手术室里也用起了智能手术灯。
tgt: In addition to smart phones, smart operation lamps are now being used in operating rooms.
hypo: In addition to smartphones, operating rooms have also started using smart surgical lights.

src: 这项发明在今年第44届瑞士日内瓦国际发明展中获得银奖。
tgt: This invention has won the silver prize in the 44th International Exhibition of Inventions in Geneva, Switzerland this year.
hypo: This invention won the silver award at the 44th Geneva International Exhibition of Inventions this year.

src: 光电科学与工程学院硕士生朱林靖、申俊飞团队在传统手术灯的缺陷中开启了新思路，发明了智能LED手术无影灯。
tgt: The team of Zhu Linjing and Shen Junfei, two graduate students from School of Optoelectronic Science and Engineering, developed a new idea trying to solve the defects of traditional operating lamps and invented the smart LED operation shadow-less lamp.
hypo: The graduate student Zhu Linjing and the team of Shen Junfeng in the Department of Optoelectronic Science and Engineering at Tsinghua University opened up a new approach in the defects of traditional surgical lights and invented an intelligent LED surgical shadow-less light.

src: “很多疾病早期检测、切除不到位，跟医生手术室用的灯有关 。 ”
tgt: “Improper early detection of many diseases and inaccurate excision are related to operation lamps used by doctors.”
hypo: Many diseases are detected and removed at an early stage, which is related to the lights in the doctor's operating room.

src: 申俊飞说，比如癌症早期检查时，医生如果不能及时看清所有肿瘤组织，那么之后癌细胞还会扩散。
tgt: According to Shen Junfei, for example, in early inspection of cancer, if doctors cannot see clearly all the tumor tissues in a timely manner, the tumor cells will still spread.
hypo: Shen Junfeng said that, for example, during early cancer screening, if doctors cannot timely identify all the tumor tissues, then cancer cells will still spread.

src: 这种智能手术灯有四个灯盘，通过调节光谱，来增强不同组织在光照下的区别度。
tgt: This type of smart operation lamp has four lamp panels, which enhance the distinction degree of different tissues by adjusting the spectrum.
hypo: This smart surgical lamp has four light plates, which can enhance the difference of different tissues under light by adjusting the spectrum.

src: 在手术过程中，医生可以根据手术需要和个人习惯，随时调节光斑的大小、光亮程度、光谱、颜色均匀性以及无影率。
tgt: During the operation process, doctors can adjust the size of light spot, brightness, spectrum, color uniformness and shadow-less degree any time according to demands of operation and personal habits.
hypo: During the surgical process, doctors can adjust the size, brightness, spectrum, color uniformity, and transparency of the light according to surgical needs and personal habits.

src: 这种智能手术灯已经在浙江大学医学院附属邵逸夫医院、浙江大学医学院附属儿童医院等医院试用，得到较好的反馈。
tgt: This type of smart operating lamp has been tried in hospitals such as Sir Run Shaw Hospital Afflicted to Zhejiang University Medical College and the Children’s Hospital Affiliated to Zhejiang University Medical College, and received favorable feedback.
hypo: This smart surgical light has been tried in hospitals such as the Hospital Affiliated to Zhejiang University School of Medicine and the Children's Hospital Affiliated to Zhejiang University School of Medicine, and has received good feedback from Sir Run.

src: 去年十月，这项发明获得国家挑战杯一等奖。
tgt: Last October, this invention won the first prize of the National Challenge Cup Competition.
hypo: Last October, this invention won first prize in the national challenge cup.

src: 用空气洗手：省水又酷炫
tgt: Washing hands with air: save water in a cool way
hypo: Washing hands with air: Saving water and heating up

src: 普通人洗手就是用水冲，顶多擦点肥皂，挤点洗手液，而李启章等同学则发明了一套“空气洗手装置 ” 。
tgt: Normally, people wash hands by flushing hands with water, with a little soap and sanitizer at most; however, Li Qizhang and his classmates invented a set of “equipment to wash hands with air”.
hypo: A set of "air washing device" was invented by Qizhang and his classmates.

src: 只要站上装置的洗手台，我们的体重就能将空气压缩而出。
tgt: As long as we stand on the washbasin of the equipment, our weight can compress the air out.
hypo: As long as we stand on the washing machine, our weight can compress the air out.

src: “就像是一个打气筒。
tgt: “Just like an inflator.
hypo: Just like an inflator.

src: 压缩出的空气，在水龙头处形成流体，和水结合在一起。
tgt: The air compressed out can form a flow at the faucet and combine with water.
hypo: The compressed air forms a fluid at the faucet and combines with the water.

src: 这样，我们就能把手洗干净啦 ！ ”
tgt: As such, we can wash our hands clean!”
hypo: So we can wash our hands clean!

src: 显色反应和细菌残留实验证明：通过这种方法洗手的效果，和普通的洗手方法是一样的。
tgt: Chromogenic reaction and germ residue experiment results prove that the effect of hand washing this way is the same as that of the ordinary method.
hypo: Chromogenic reaction and bacterial residue experiments have proven that the effect of this method of handwashing is the same as that of a regular handwashing method.

src: 这个装置只需要依靠我们自身的重力作为驱动，既能保证洗净程度，又能节约90%的水，整个过程完全无能耗，节能环保。
tgt: This equipment is only driven by our weight, which can not only guarantee we wash our hands clean, but also save 90% of water; the entire process has no energy consumption and is energy-saving and environment-friendly.
hypo: This device only needs to rely on our own gravity as the driving force, which can ensure the cleaning degree and save 90% of water. The whole process is completely energy-saving and environmentally friendly.

src: 去年，在第二届全球重大挑战峰会中，这项发明在诸多世界顶尖名校中脱颖而出，获得唯一的金奖。
tgt: Last year, at the 2nd Global Grand Challenge Summit, this invention emerged among all the top universities in the world and was awarded with the only gold award.
hypo: Last year, at the second Global Summit of Major Challenges, this invention stood out among many world-renowned universities and received the only gold award.

src: 重庆中职学校试点现代学徒制 入学即是企业准员工-新华网
tgt: Modern apprenticeship system is tried in secondary vocational schools in Chongqing, and students are qualified employees-to-be after entrance - Xinhuanet
hypo: Chongqing Municipal Vocational School Pilot Modern Student System: Entrance is Employees of Enterprises - Xinhuanet

src: 昨天，记者从市教委获悉，今年起，我市将在60所中职学校试点“现代学徒制”人才培养模式，接受试点培养的学生同时具备学徒身份，招生录入后将被试点企业预录为单位员工。
tgt: It was learned from the Municipal Commission of Education yesterday that our city will start to implement “modern apprenticeship system” in 60 secondary vocational schools from this year, and the students participating in the program have the identity of apprenticeship at the same time, who will be pre-recruited as employees of the experimental units after being enrolled.
hypo: Yesterday, reporters learned from the city's Education Committee that starting this year, our city will pilot the "modern apprenticeship" talent cultivation model in 60 vocational schools. Students who participate in the pilot will be enrolled as "modern apprentices" and will be pre-hired by pilot enterprises after enrollment.

src: 市教委要求，规范中职学校招生录取和企业用工程序，明确学徒的中职学校学生和企业准员工双重身份，按照双向选择原则，学徒、学校和企业签订三方协议，对于年满16周岁未达到18周岁的学徒，须由学徒、监护人、学校和企业四方签订协议，确定各方权益及学徒在岗培养的具体岗位、教学内容、权益保障等。
tgt: According to the requirements of the Municipal Commission of Education, it is necessary to standardize the enrollment procedure of secondary vocational schools and the enterprise employment procedure, specify the dual identities of the students as both students of secondary vocational schools and employees-to-be of enterprises; according to the two-way selection principle, three-party agreement shall be signed by apprentices, schools and enterprises; for apprentices from the age of 16 to 18 years old, four-party agreement shall be signed by apprentices, guardians, schools and enterprises, to determine the rights and interests of all parties as well as specific posts, teaching content, protection of rights and interests, etc.
hypo: The Municipal Education Committee requires that norms be established for the enrollment of vocational colleges and enterprise recruitment procedures, and that the dual identity of students who are enrolled in vocational colleges and employed by enterprises be clearly defined. According to the principle of mutual selection, students, schools, and enterprises will sign a three-party agreement, and for students under the age of 16 who have not yet reached the age of 18, a four-party agreement will be signed by students, guardians, schools, and enterprises to determine the rights and obligations of each party, as well as the specific position, teaching content, and safeguards for the rights and

src: 鼓励试点学校采用现代学徒制形式与合作企业联合开展企业员工岗前培训和转岗培训。
tgt: Experimental unit schools are encouraged to adopt the modern apprenticeship system and work with cooperative enterprises to carry out pre-job training and post-shift training for employees.
hypo: Encourage pilot schools to adopt modern apprenticeship forms and cooperate with enterprises to jointly carry out pre-shift and post-shift training for enterprise employees.

src: 试点学校要改革人才培养模式。
tgt: Experimental unit schools shall carry out reform on talent cultivation model.
hypo: The experimental school will reform the talent cultivation model.

src: 校企共同设计人才培养方案，共同制订专业教学标准、课程标准、岗位标准、企业师傅标准、质量监控标准及相应实施方案。
tgt: Experimental unit schools and enterprises shall work together to design talent training plan and jointly formulate professional teaching standard, curriculum standard, post standard, enterprise master standard, quality monitoring standard and corresponding implementation plan.
hypo: The school and enterprise jointly designed a talent cultivation plan, jointly formulated professional teaching standards, curriculum standards, position standards, enterprise mentor standards, quality control standards, and corresponding implementation plans.

src: 试点以培养学制为一个试点周期，学生在企业的实习时间根据专业人才培养方案确定，顶岗实习一般为6个月。
tgt: The experimental unit schools take each training program as a period for experiment, and the time of internship of students in enterprises shall be determined according to professional talent training plan; in-post internship is generally 6 months.
hypo: The pilot period for the curriculum is generally 1-2 years, and students' internship time is determined according to the talent cultivation plan in their respective majors. Top-tier internships usually last for 6 months.

src: 在企业实践应实施企业班组化管理模式，根据不同专业的特点，1个师傅可带2～5个徒弟，组成学习小组，确保学生熟练掌握每个轮训岗位所需的技能。
tgt: Enterprise working group management mode shall be implemented during enterprise practices; according to features of different majors, one master can teach 2 to 5 apprentices, and learning groups can be formed to ensure that students can master the skills required for each post of training in rotation.
hypo: In the practice of enterprises, the enterprise team organization management model should be implemented. According to the characteristics of different professions, one master can bring 2 to 5 disciples together to form a study group, ensuring that students are proficient in the skills required for each position in the curriculum.

src: 根据安排，从2016年起到2019年8月，我市分三批确定60个市级中职现代学徒制试点，每个试点人数在50人左右，总共培养3000名左右学生（学徒 ） 。
tgt: According to the arrangement, the 60 municipal modern apprenticeship system experimental units will be determined in three batches from 2016 to August, 2019, with about 50 apprentices in each experiment unit, and a total of around 3000 students (apprentices) will be trained.
hypo: According to the arrangement, from 2016 to August 2019, our city divided into three batches to determine 60 pilot modern students in each batch, with a total of about 3000 students (students).

src: 按照先试点再推行，由点到面逐步推进的原则，探索建立校企联合招生、联合培养、一体化育人的长效机制，切实提升学生岗位技能，提高学生对口就业率和就业质量。
tgt: According to the principle of experimental units first and implementation later, and gradual advancement from point to area, the long-term mechanism of joint recruitment by schools and enterprises, joint training and integrated training shall be explored and established, so as to fundamentally improve the job skills of students and improve the rate of employment fitting students’ major, as well as the quality of employment quality of students.
hypo: Based on the pilot-tested and step-by-step implementation principle, we will explore the establishment of a long-term mechanism for school-enterprise joint recruitment, joint training, and integrated cultivation of talents. This will effectively enhance students' skills and improve their employment rate and quality.

src: 中国儿童中心将举办系列活动让孩子“高科技”过“六一 ” - 新华网
tgt: China Children’s Center will hold a series of activities to let children celebrate “Children’s Day” with high technology – Xinhuanet
hypo: China Children's Center will hold a series of activities to help children "high-tech" over "6.1" - Xinhua

src: 新华社北京５月２０日电（黄小希 周珊珊）记者２０日从中国儿童中心获悉，５月２８日至６月１日“六一”儿童节前后，中国儿童中心计划将举办儿童创客体验、儿童视觉艺术节、亲子书香嘉年华等一系列活动，让孩子们在前沿科技的魅力中度过“六一 ” 。
tgt: Message from Xinhua News Agency Beijing on May 20 (journalists: Huang Xiaoxi and Zhou Shanshan) According to China Children’s Center on May 20, from May 28 to June 1, before and on the “Children’s Day”, China Children’s Center will hold a series of activities such as Children as Makers, Children’s Visual Art Festival and the Carnival of Parent-Child Reading, to let children celebrate Children’s Day while immersing themselves in the charisma of cutting-edge technologies.
hypo: Xinhua News Agency Beijing May 20 wire (Huang Xiaohui, Zhou Xinyan) On the 20th, reporters learned from China Children’s Center that from May 28 to June 1 before and after “June 1” Children’s Day, China Children’s Center will hold a series of activities such as children’s creative experience, children’s visual art festival, parent-child book fair, etc., so that children can spend the “June 1” in the charm of cutting-edge technology.

src: 据了解，中国儿童中心今年“六一”儿童节期间举办的活动包括“爱家创酷”儿童未来学习嘉年华、首届儿童视觉艺术节 、 “ 书香嘉年华”活动 、 “ 全家爱阅读”绘本系列活动等。
tgt: It is understood that the activities held during the “Children’s Day” by China Children’s Center this year include the “Cool Maker Loves Family” carnival of children’s future learning, the first children’s visual art festival, the “Book Carnival” event and the “Whole Family Loves Reading” Picture Book Reading activity.
hypo: It is understood that the activities held by the China Children's Center during the "June 1" Children's Day this year include "Love Home Creativity", the first Children's Visual Art Festival, "Book Smell", and the "Reading Together" children's book series.

src: 中国儿童中心副主任李忠明在２０日举行的２０１６年“六一”儿童节媒体通气会上介绍说 ， “ 爱家创酷”儿童未来学习嘉年华是今年中国儿童中心庆“六一”的重点活动。
tgt: According to the introduction from Li Zhongming, Deputy Director of China Children’s Center, at the 2016 “Children’s Day” media exchange meeting held on May 20, “Cool Maker Loves Family” carnival of children’s future learning is a key activity held by China Children’s Center for “Children’s Day”.
hypo: At the 2016 “June 1” Children’s Day media communication meeting held on the 20th, Li Zhuangming, deputy director of the China Children’s Center, said that “Love Home Creativity” children’s future learning is the key activity of this year’s China Children’s Center celebration of “June 1”.

src: 活动着眼于将社会创新与家庭个人创意有机结合，通过儿童和家庭参与体验各种创新教育活动，让创新实践成为大众家庭的文化基因，让“动手做”成为广大家庭新的学习和生活方式。
tgt: The activity focuses on combining social innovation and family and personal creativity; the activity makes innovative practices a cultural gene of the public by letting children and their families experience various innovative and educational activities, to make “do-it-yourself” as a new way of learning and living of families.
hypo: The event focuses on organically combining social innovation with individual creativity by involving children and families in various innovative educational activities, making innovative practice a cultural gene for the general public and turning "hands-on experience" into a new way of learning and living for families.

src: 据悉 ， “ 爱家创酷”儿童未来学习嘉年华包括“豆果创客”体验活动、老牛儿童探索馆周年庆暨“探索全家爱 童萌过六一”活动、ＶＲ全民体验计划 、 “ 创客部落”互动工作坊等几十项前沿科技体验内容。
tgt: It is understood that “Cool Maker Loves Family” carnival of children’s future learning includes dozens of leading scientific and technological experience such as the “Douguo Makers” experience activity, Old Cow children exploration house anniversary celebration and the “Exploring Love of the Whole Family, Celebrate the Children’s Day with Innocence” activity, VR Public Experience Plan and “Creator Tribe” interaction workshop.
hypo: It is understood that “Love Home Creativity” children’s future learning includes more than 30 cutting-edge science and technology experience activities, such as “Doufu Crew” experience activities, the 10th anniversary celebration of the Children’s Discovery Museum and “Explore the whole family’s love for children” activities, VR interactive plan, “Crew Camp” interactive workshop and so on.

src: 南非医生：奥密克戎传播力虽强 但多为轻症
tgt: Doctors from South Africa: Although more transmissible, most of the patients infected by Omicron are mild cases
hypo: South African doctors: Ebola transmission strong but mostly mild

src: 南非许多医生和医疗专家认为，新冠病毒奥密克戎变种所致病症比德尔塔变种更为轻微，虽然传播速度更快。
tgt: Many doctors and medical experts in South Africa believe that patients infected by Omicron are milder cases compared with those infected by Delta, although Omicron is more transmissible.
hypo: Many medical experts and professionals in South Africa believe that the milder cases of COVID-19 caused by the Omicron variant are more prevalent, although the transmission rate is faster.

src: 据美联社报道，随着奥密克戎变种在南非的传播，南非豪登省的一个五千多名医生组成医师组织报告说，他们目前治疗的新冠病人出现的症状都比较轻微，例如身体疼痛和咳嗽等与流感类似的症状。
tgt: According to report from the Associated Press, as Omicron is being transmitted in South Africa, a report by a physician organization composed by more than 5,000 doctors in Gauteng, South Africa says that most of the current patients of COVID-19 in treatment have mild symptoms, such as body ache and cough, which are similar to symptoms of flu.
hypo: According to Reuters, with the spread of the Omicron variant in South Africa, a group of more than 5,000 doctors in the province of Gauteng reported that they are currently treating patients with mild symptoms similar to those of the flu, such as body aches and coughing.

src: 该组织总监安本·皮莱（Unben Pillay）医生说，他每天都要看几十名病人，但是还没有任何病人需要住院。
tgt: According to Doctor Unben Pillay, chief supervisor of the organization, he needs to provide medical services to dozens of patients every day, but none of them needs to be hospitalized.
hypo: Dr. Unben Pillay, the CEO of the organization, said that he sees dozens of patients every day, but none of them require hospitalization.

src: 皮莱说 ： “ 他们能够在家里控制疾病，大多数人在隔离10至14天内康复 。 ”
tgt: Pillay said, “Their diseases can be controlled at home, and most of them can recover after quarantine of 10 to 14 days.”
hypo: Pillay said, "They can control the disease at home, and most people recover within 10 to 14 days of quarantine."

src: 他说，这包括老年患者和那些有健康问题的患者，这些人群本来更容易因冠状病毒感染而陷入重症。
tgt: He said that those included aged patients and patients with health problems, who were easier to become severe cases due to infection of the COVID-19.
hypo: He said that this includes elderly patients and those with health problems, who are more susceptible to severe complications from COVID-19.

src: 他说，与之相比，在上一波的德尔塔疫情中，他治疗的新冠患者“呼吸困难，血氧水平低。
tgt: He said that, in comparison, the COVID-19 patients he treated in the last round of epidemic suffered from “breathing difficulties and low blood oxygen.
hypo: He said that compared to the previous outbreak, the new coronavirus patients he treated suffered from "difficulty breathing and low blood oxygen."

src: 许多人几天内就要住院 ” 。
tgt: Many of them needed to be hospitalized within only a few days”.
hypo: Many people will be hospitalized within only a few days.

src: 在南部非洲首次报告奥密克戎变异毒株后的两周内，其他医生也分享了类似的经验。
tgt: Other doctors shared similar experience within 2 weeks after the first report of Omicron the new variant in South Africa.
hypo: Within two weeks of the first report of the Omicron variant in southern Africa, other doctors also shared similar experiences.

src: 虽然收集足够的数据还需要几个星期的时间，但医生的观察和早期证据提供了一些线索。
tgt: Although it will take some more weeks to collect sufficient evidence, observation and early proof from doctors have provided some clues.
hypo: Although it will take several weeks to collect sufficient data, the doctor's observation and early evidence have provided some clues.

src: 据南非国家传染病研究所总结：在近几周住院的新冠患者中，只有30%是严重病症，是前一波疫情重症比例的一半；平均住院时间从8天缩短到2.8天；近期的新冠患者中，仅有3%死亡，而在南非早期爆发的病例中，死亡比例达20 % 。
tgt: According to the summary made by National Institute of Infectious Diseases of South Africa, among the patients of COVID-19 who were hospitalized within the last few weeks, only 30% of them were severe cases, which accounts for a half of the proportion of severe cases of the last round of epidemic; the average stay at hospital is reduced from 8 days to 2.8 days; only 3% of the latest patients of COVID-19 died, which used to be as high as 20% in the cases of the early epidemic phase in South Africa.
hypo: According to the South African National Institute of Communicable Diseases, of the new COVID-19 cases admitted to hospital in the past few weeks, only 30% were severe cases, half of the proportion of severe cases in the previous wave of the epidemic; the average length of hospital stay has decreased from 8 days to 2.8 days; among recent COVID-19 cases, only 3% have died, while in the early cases in South Africa, the mortality rate was 20%.

src: 非洲健康研究所所长威廉·哈内科姆（Willem Hanekom）引用国家传染病研究所的数据和其他报告说 ： “ 目前，几乎所有的迹象都表明，这是一种较温和的疾病 。 ”
tgt: By quoting the data from National Institute of Infectious Diseases of South Africa and other reports, Willem Hanekom, Director of Africa Institute of Health said, “At present, almost all the evidence indicates that this is a relatively mild disease.”
hypo: Willem Hanekom, director of the Africa Health Research Institute, quoted data from the National Institute of Communicable Diseases and other reports as saying, "Currently, almost all indicators suggest that this is a relatively mild disease."

src: 他还说 ： “ 现在还是早期，我们需要获得后期数据。
tgt: He also said: “However, it’s still at early stage, and we need to obtain data of later stage.
hypo: He also said, "We still need to obtain late-stage data now."

src: 通常情况下，住院和死亡发生的时间较晚，而我们进入这一波疫情的时间只有两周 。 ”
tgt: In general situations, hospitalization and death happen later, and it’s only two weeks since we entered into this round of epidemic.”
hypo: Typically, hospitalization and death occur later in the course of the disease, but we are only two weeks into this wave of the epidemic.

src: 与此同时，世界各地的科学家正在观察病例数和住院率，同时测试目前的疫苗和治疗方法的效果。
tgt: At the same time, scientists from all over the whole world are observing the number of medical cases and the rate of hospitalization, as well as testing the effect of the current vaccines and treatment method.
hypo: Meanwhile, scientists around the world are observing case numbers and hospitalization rates, while also testing the effectiveness of current vaccines and treatments.

src: 尽管德尔塔仍然是全世界主要的新冠病毒株，但奥密克戎病例正在数十个国家出现，其中南非为疫情中心。
tgt: Although Delta is still the main COVID-19 virus strain of the world, Omicron cases are emerging in dozens of countries with South Africa at the center of the epidemic.
hypo: Although Delta, is still, Omicron cases are appearing in dozens of countries, with South Africa being the epicenter of the epidemic.

src: 据卫生官员介绍，豪登省在12月的第一周发现的新病例增加了400 % ， 测试显示，奥密克戎变体的病例占90%以上。
tgt: According to introduction from health officials, the new cases detected in Gauteng province in the first week of December increased by 400%; according to test results, Omicron variant cases accounted for more than 90%.
hypo: According to health officials, the number of new cases detected in the first week of December in Gauteng increased by 400%, with tests showing that over 90% of the cases were of the Omicron variant.

src: 教育时评:拯救被拐儿童要靠什么？
tgt: Education news commentary: What should we do to rescue abducted children?
hypo: Education Time: What should be done to save abducted children?

src: 如果类比“没有买卖就没有杀害”的著名公益广告语，那么，在没有“收拐”需求的良好环境里，群防群治、全民反拐，使拐卖行为无利可图、风险大、成本高，这类犯罪也就不会屡屡发生。
tgt: As the famous public service advertising says, “there is no killing if there is no buying”; in a good environment with no demand of “buying abducted children”, if the masses can prevent and fight against abduction together and make abduction an action with no benefit, high risk and cost, then such crimes will not happen again.
hypo: As the saying goes, "No buying, no selling, no killing," in a good environment without the demand of "extortion," group self-defense and mass anti-extortion make the act of extortion unprofitable, risky, and expensive, so such crimes will not happen again.

src: 近日，公安部刑事侦查局打拐办开发的儿童失踪信息紧急发布平台上线。
tgt: Recently, the platform of emergency release of missing children information developed by the Anti-Abduction Office of Criminal Investigation Bureau of the Ministry of Public Security went online.
hypo: Recently, the Ministry of Public Security's Criminal Investigation Department launched an emergency platform for disseminating information on missing children.

src: 这是为建立儿童失踪信息发布的权威渠道、及时找回被拐儿童而创设的互联网信息平台。
tgt: This is an Internet information platform established as an authoritative channel for the release of missing children information and timely finding the abducted children.
hypo: This is to establish an authoritative channel for the release of child abduction information and an internet information platform for timely recovery of abducted children.

src: 听闻此App名为“团圆 ” ， 顿觉暖意十足。
tgt: I feel warm after hearing the App is named “reunion”.
hypo: I feel that the name of this app, "Unity," is warm and cozy.

src: 新技术手段不仅名称“文艺 ” 、 情怀满满，而且信息化运用得当，实用、有效。
tgt: This new technical means not only has an “artistic” name and full of warm feelings, but also makes appropriate use of informatization, making itself practical and effective.
hypo: The new technological means are not only named "Literature" and full of sentiment, but also makes appropriate use of information and is practical and effective.

src: 打拐执法，首要目标是寻回被拐的孩子，保护其人身安全、自由。
tgt: The first and foremost objective of fighting against abduction is to find the abducted children and ensure their security and freedom.
hypo: The foremost goal of law enforcement is to search for and protect children who have been abducted, ensuring their personal safety and freedom.

src: 其次才是对嫌疑人的审判与惩罚。
tgt: The judgment and punishment to the suspect is secondary.
hypo: The second step is the trial and punishment of the suspect.

src: 刑事惩罚的意义，从个别惩罚、社会预防到法律教育，可以列举很多“大词 ” 。
tgt: In terms of the significance of criminal punishment, lots of “big words” can be listed from individual punishment and social prevention to legal education.
hypo: The significance of criminal punishment, from individual punishment, social prevention to legal education, can be listed as many "big words".

src: 但在拐卖案件告破之前，应优先关注被害人的人身安全。
tgt: However, before solving an abduction case, the safety of the victims should be priority.
hypo: However, before the abduction case is solved, the personal safety of the victim should be prioritized.

src: 事分轻重缓急，在急切的“寻救”目的之下，诸如“拐卖儿童是否应当一律死刑”之类众说纷纭、争议较大的话题，可以暂搁下来，谨慎讨论；但救助被拐儿童的事情等不得。
tgt: There are orders of priority; with the urgent goal of “rescue”, the discussion on contentious topics with divergent public opinions such as “if death penalty shall be applied to criminals of child abduction” can be shelved for now and be discussed with discretion; however, rescuing abducted children cannot be delayed.
hypo: In the face of urgent "rescue" purposes, topics such as "whether child abduction should be punishable by death" and other controversial issues can be temporarily postponed and cautiously discussed; but matters such as rescuing abducted children cannot be neglected.

src: 根据此类案件的侦办经验，人贩子惯于在得手之后尽快远离作案地点。
tgt: According to the experience in solving such cases, human trafficking traders tend to run away from the crime scene as soon as possible after the crime.
hypo: According to the experience of such cases, human traffickers are accustomed to leaving the crime scene as soon as possible after the deed is done.

src: 寻拐行动多耽搁一分钟，孩子就可能更远离家长一步，案件侦破的难度也就增加一分。
tgt: Therefore, with each minute delayed in finding abducted children, the children are farther from the parents, and the difficulty of solving the case also increases.
hypo: Solving the case takes one minute, and the child may be one step farther away from their parents.

src: 在此情况下，拿出如“团圆”平台这样直接有助于侦破案件、寻回孩子的有效办法，确实是务实的行动。
tgt: In this case, it is a practical action to present a platform such as “reunion” which can help solve the case and provide an effective method to find the children.
hypo: In this case, using a platform like "WeChat" to directly help solve the case and find the child is indeed an effective action.

src: 毕竟 ， “ 打拐”是需要运作起整个法制系统来做好的一件大任务。
tgt: After all, cracking down on abduction is a major task that requires the coordination of the entire legal system.
hypo: After all, "coordination" is a big task that requires the coordination of the entire legal system.

src: 打击犯罪、保障儿童和家长权益，从立法的完善，到司法的保障，以及执法的缜密，无不需要贯彻“护幼扶弱”的关怀。
tgt: To crack down on crimes and protect the interests of children and parents, the care of “protecting the young and helping the weak” shall be implemented in the improvement of legislation, and in safeguarding judicial system and meticulous enforcement.
hypo: Combating crime, protecting the rights and interests of children and parents, from the perfection of legislation to the safeguarding of the judiciary, as well as the clandestine operations of law enforcement, all require the implementation of "safeguarding the weak and vulnerable".

src: 此外，拐卖儿童的预防，从家庭到社会，都还可以做得更好。
tgt: In addition, we can do better to prevent abduction of children from the perspectives of both family and society.
hypo: In addition, the prevention of child trafficking, from the perspective of the family to the society, can also be done better.

src: 比如一个常见的案例，一家三口在火车站休息，父母熟睡，醒来才发现孩子不见了。
tgt: Take a common case as an example; parents and a child were taking a rest at the train station, and the parents found their child missing after waking up.
hypo: For example, a common scenario is when a family of three takes a break at the train station and only wakes up to find that their child is missing.

src: 不能期待一个两岁的孩子具有足够的自我保护技能，但作为年幼孩子的家长，应至少具有相当的保护意识。
tgt: You cannot expect a 2-year-old child to protect himself/herself; however, as parents of young children, adults shall have at least some degree of protection awareness.
hypo: It is not possible to expect a two-year-old child to have sufficient self-protection skills, but as a parent of young children, at least a certain degree of protective awareness should be possessed.

src: 父母两人轮流休息，又或将孩子置于稳妥的保护之下，都是预防儿童被拐的最起码手段。
tgt: The father and the mother can take turns in taking rest, or they can protect their child in a proper way, which are the basic approaches for protecting children from being abducted.
hypo: Making sure to include these words: protect their, for protecting, father and

src: 从警方打击拐卖犯罪的另一面看，购买被拐儿童一方也应被关注和惩治。
tgt: Viewing from the other side of the crackdown on abduction, the party purchasing the abducted children shall be given attention to and punished, too.
hypo: From the other side of the police cracking down on human trafficking, those who purchase abducted children should also be concerned and punished.

src: 单个的不法行为，往往只是长长链条中的一环。
tgt: Any single illegal behavior is usually one link of a long chain.
hypo: One illegal act is often just one link in a long chain.

src: 根据我国《刑法》规定，拐卖儿童罪的法定刑起刑点为5年；情节特别严重的，可至死刑，并处没收财产。
tgt: According to the Penal Code in our country, the criminal penalty starting point of child abduction and sale is 5 years; suspects with especially serious circumstance may be sentenced to death penalty with confiscation of property.
hypo: According to the provisions of the Criminal Law of the People's Republic of China, the prescribed punishment for the crime of trafficking children is 5 years of imprisonment. In cases where the circumstances are particularly severe, the death penalty may be imposed, and the offender's property may be confiscated.

src: 起刑点高、最高刑重，在“轻刑化”的大趋势下，拐卖儿童罪显然属于处罚较重的罪。
tgt: Under the trend of “light sentencing”, the crime of abducting and selling children has a high starting point and heavy maximum standard of sentencing, and thus it is clearly a crime with heavier sentence.
hypo: Under the trend of "light punishment", the crime of trafficking children is obviously a crime with heavier punishment.

src: 可至今每年仍还有不少的拐卖案件发生。
tgt: However, there are still lots of cases of abduction every year.
hypo: To this day, there are still many cases of abduction every year.

src: 可见，部分人在养育儿女方面的观念落后，法律意识淡薄。
tgt: It is clear that some people are still lagging behind in the concept of raising children and have dim legal awareness.
hypo: It is evident that some people are still lagging behind in terms of their views on raising children, and their legal awareness is also quite weak.

src: 对这部分人的法制教育应该同步跟进。
tgt: Legal education should be provided to these people.
hypo: Legal education should be provided for these people to ensure that their legal knowledge is up to date.

src: 要有效控制拐卖犯罪，不能仅靠官方严格执法。
tgt: It requires not only strict enforcement from authorities to effectively control the crime of abduction and selling.
hypo: To effectively control the crime of trafficking, it is not enough to rely solely on strict law enforcement by the authorities.

src: 倘若收拐“市场”广泛存在，拐卖者利欲熏心，不断创新拐卖手段，形成与执法者的“斗法”局面，打拐行动势必会陷入低效的泥淖。
tgt: If the “market” of buying abducted children still exists, and abductors continuously create new ways to abduct children driven by the profits; this will lead to a situation where the criminals and law enforcers plot against each other, and the action to crack down on adduction will inevitably be low in efficiency.
hypo: If the "market" is widespread and the sellers are eager to innovate their selling methods, they will form a "fighting" situation with the law enforcers, and the crackdown operation will inevitably fall into a quagmire of inefficiency.

src: 因此，破除落后观念，普及法律常识，也有助于根治拐卖、收买儿童犯罪。
tgt: Therefore, correcting outdated concepts and popularizing legal common sense are also conducive to eradicating the crime of abducting, trafficking and buying children.
hypo: Therefore, breaking the backward mentality, popularizing legal norms, also helps to eradicate the crime of buying and selling children.

src: 杨浩东在马栏山宣讲党的十九届六中全会和省党代会精神
tgt: Yang Haodong publicized the spirit of the Sixth Plenary Session of the 19th Central Committee of the CPC and the provincial congress of Party representatives.
hypo: Yang Hao delivered a keynote speech on the spirit of the 19th National Congress of the Communist Party of China and the Provincial Party Committee

src: 从党的百年奋斗史中汲取奋进力量
tgt: Draw energy from the history of the 100 years of struggle of the Party
hypo: Draw inspiration from the Party's century-long struggle history

src: 湖南日报12月10日讯（全媒体记者 龚柏威）根据省委统一安排，12月10日上午，省委常委、省委宣传部部长杨浩东在马栏山视频文创园作互动宣讲，深入学习贯彻党的十九届六中全会精神，学习贯彻习近平总书记对湖南重要讲话重要指示批示精神，学习贯彻省第十二次党代会精神。
tgt: Report of Hunan Daily on December 10 (full-media journalist: Gong Bowei), according to unified arrangement of the provincial Party committee, on the morning of December 10, Yang Haodong, a member of the Standing Committee of CPC Provincial Committee and the Ministry of Publicity Department of the provincial Party committee, gave a lecture in the Malan Mountain video cultural and creative park, to study the spirit of the sixth plenary session of the 19th central committee, the spirit of the important instructions about Hunan by General Secretary Xi Jinping, and the spirit of the 12th Party congress of Hunan.
hypo: On December 10th, according to the unified arrangement of the Hunan Provincial Party Committee, the Hunan Provincial Commission for Discipline Inspection, and the Hunan Provincial Propaganda Department, Yang Hengdong, member of the Standing Committee of the Hunan Provincial Party Committee and Head of the Hunan Provincial Propaganda Department, conducted an interactive publicity at the video creation park of Ma'anshan, and in-depth studied and implemented the spirit of the 19th CPC National Congress, the spirit of Xi Jinping's report to the 19th CPC National Congress, and the spirit of the 12th Hunan Provin

src: 杨浩东从理想信念与初心使命、自我革命与青春大党、党的领袖和党的理论等三个方面，结合自身感悟、亲身经历，深入浅出、全面系统地阐释了全会精神的核心要义和实践要求。
tgt: In combination of his feelings and experiences, Yang Haodong interpreted the core essence and the requirement on practice of the spirit of the sixth plenary session of the 19th central committee in terms of three aspects, i.e., original aspiration and mission, self-revolution, as well as the young Party, leaders of Party and theory of the Party.
hypo: Yang Hao Dong combined his ideals, beliefs, and initial mission, self-revolution and youthful enthusiasm for the Party, the Party's leadership, and the Party's theories, and interpreted the core essence and practical requirements of the spirit of the 19th CPC National Congress from the perspectives of self-reflection, self-experience, and self-transcendence.

src: 他指出，要将全会精神和习近平总书记对湖南重要讲话重要指示批示精神、省党代会精神结合起来学，融会贯通学，增强捍卫“两个确立 ” 、 做到“两个维护”的思想自觉、政治自觉、行动自觉，坚定不移沿着习近平总书记指引的方向前进。
tgt: As pointed by Yang Haodong, it is necessary to combine the spirit of the sixth plenary session of the 19th central committee and the spirit of the important instructions about Hunan by General Secretary Xi Jinping, and the spirit of the 12th Party congress of Hunan, to digest them and strengthen the guarding of the “two-establishment” and the ideological consciousness, political consciousness and action consciousness of the “two-guarding”, and to unwaveringly move forward in the direction pointed by General Secretary Xi Jinping.
hypo: He pointed out that we should combine the spirit of the congress with the important instructions given by General Secretary Xi Jinping for Hunan, the spirit of the Provincial Congress, and the spirit of the report of the 19th CPC National Congress to study, integrate, and strengthen the idea, political awareness, and action awareness of defending the “two established” and safeguarding the “two maintained”.

src: 在互动交流环节，基层干部代表、企业代表、青年代表就三个历史决议的关系、如何理解“两个确立”的决定性意义、文化企业如何把握导向、新时代青年如何从百年党史中汲取力量等进行了提问，杨浩东以通俗的语言、生动的事例一一解答，他殷殷寄语青年党员，要从党的百年奋斗史中，汲取奋进的力量，紧密团结在党中央周围，坚定不移跟党走,用青春奉献书写责任和担当。
tgt: In the interaction and exchange part, representatives of grass-rooted cadres, representatives of enterprises and representatives of young people asked questions about relationship among the three historical resolutions, correct understanding on decisive significance of the “two-establishment”, the way for cultural enterprises to master the orientation and the way for young people to abstract energy from the Party’s 100-year history; Yang Haodong answered the questions in plain language and with vivid cases, and he hoped the young Party members would abstract energy for progress from the history of the Party of 100 years, be unified around the Party Central Committee and follow the decisions made by the Party unswervingly and write responsibility and undertaking with youth and contributions.
hypo: In the interactive exchange section, the representatives of grassroots cadres, enterprises, and young people asked questions about the relationship between the three historical resolutions, how to understand the decisive significance of the "two establishments", how cultural enterprises can grasp the direction, how young people in the new era can draw strength from the hundred-year history of the Party, and so on. Yang Heng answered them one by one with plain language and vivid examples. He urged the young members of the Party to draw strength from the hundred-year history of the Party, unite closely around the Party Central Committee, and firmly follow the Party.

src: 2022年北京地区高校毕业生预计达26.8万人-新华网
tgt: The number of university and college graduates in Beijing is expected to reach 268,000 in 2022 - Xinhua News
hypo: 2022年北京地区高校毕业生预计达26.8万人-新华网

src: 新华社北京12月11日电（记者阳娜）记者从近日北京市教委、北京市人力资源和社会保障局联合召开的2022届北京高校毕业生就业创业工作视频会议上获悉，2022年北京地区高校毕业生预计达26.8万人，比去年增加1.6万人。
tgt: Xinhua News Agency Beijing December 11th (Reporter Yang Na) Reporter learned from the 2022 Beijing University and College Graduates’ Employment and Entrepreneurship Video Conference jointly held by the Beijing Municipal Education Commission and the Beijing Municipal Bureau of Human Resources and Social Security that the number of university and college graduates in Beijing is expected to reach 268,000 in 2022, increased by 16,000 compared with last year.
hypo: Xinhua News Agency Beijing December 11 wire (Reporter Yang Na) Reporters learned from the 2022 Beijing Higher Education Graduates Employment and Entrepreneurship Video Conference held by the Beijing Municipal Education Committee and the Beijing Municipal Human Resources and Social Security Bureau that the number of expected graduates in Beijing in 2022 is 268,000, an increase of 16,000 compared to last year.

src: 北京市人力资源和社会保障局相关负责人表示，将从加强供需匹配、强化政策支持、拓宽就业渠道、确保困难帮扶、支持创新创业、提升服务效能等方面部署北京高校毕业生就业工作。
tgt: Responsible person from Beijing Municipal Bureau of Human Resources and Social Security introduced that the employment of university and college graduates in Beijing will be deployed from the aspects of strengthening the matching of supply and demand, strengthening policy support, broadening employment channels, ensuring to provide assistance for those with difficulties, supporting innovation and entrepreneurship, and improving service efficiency.
hypo: Officials from the Beijing Municipal Human Resources and Social Security Bureau stated that they will deploy university graduates from Beijing's higher education institutions to work on improving service, strengthening policy support, expanding employment channels, ensuring assistance for those in need, supporting innovation and entrepreneurship, and enhancing service efficiency.

src: 记者了解到，北京市人力资源和社会保障局将搭建实践平台，加大岗位供给，主动联系40家高校毕业生职场体验基地，走访用人单位，整合需求信息和岗位信息；重点抓好“六个一批 ” ， 即拓宽事业单位招录一批，拓宽国有企业招聘一批，拓宽基层项目招募一批，拓宽应征入伍一批，拓宽就业见习留用一批，拓宽创业带动就业一批；实行“一生一策”动态管理，为每位毕业生推荐不少于5个岗位信息，确保有就业意愿的困难家庭毕业生100%实现帮扶等。
tgt: Reporter learned that Beijing Municipal Bureau of Human Resources and Social Security will establish a platform to increase work position supply, take the initiative to contact 40 job experience bases for college graduates, visit employing unit, and integrate demand information and job information; focus on the "six batches", that is, expand the batch of recruitment of institutions, expand the batch of recruitment of state-owned enterprises, expand the batch of recruitment of grass-roots projects, expand the batch of recruitment of military recruits, expand the batch of employment probation retention, and expand the batch of entrepreneurship to promote employment; implement the dynamic management of "one policy for one student", recommend no less than 5 jobs for each graduate, and ensure that 100% of graduates from poor families with the willingness to work will be assisted.
hypo: The reporter learned that Beijing Municipal Human Resources and Social Security Bureau will build a practical platform, increase the number of positions offered, proactively contact 40 experience bases for college graduates, visit enterprises, integrate demand and position information; focus on "six in a batch", that is, recruit a batch of graduates for enterprises, recruit a batch of graduates for state-owned enterprises, recruit a batch of graduates for grassroots projects, recruit a batch of graduates for compulsory military service, recruit a batch of graduates for employment retention, and promote entrepreneurship to drive employment; implement "one-life, one-

src: 民主峰会落幕，拜登称自由之火永不熄灭
tgt: The Summit for Democracy ended, and Biden said the fire of freedom would never extinguish
hypo: Democratic National Convention ends, Biden says the torch of freedom will never be extinguished

src: 由美国总统拜登召集、有全球110个国家的政府以及公民社会和私营部门领导人出席的线上“民主峰会 ” ( Summit for Democracy)星期五（12月10日）落幕。
tgt: The online “Summit for Democracy” held by Biden, the U.S. president, and attended by leaders of governments, civil society and private sector from 110 countries came to a close on Friday (December 10).
hypo: The online "Democracy Summit" attended by leaders from 110 countries' governments, civil society, and private sectors, as well as U.S. President Biden, came to a close on Friday (December 10).

src: 拜登在闭幕词中说，自由之火在世界每个人的心中燃烧，专制政权永远无法将其熄灭。
tgt: Biden said in the closing speech that a dictatorship can never extinguish the flame of liberty that burns in the hearts of people around the world.
hypo: In his closing speech, Biden said that the flame of freedom burns in every person's heart around the world, and dictatorships can never extinguish it.

src: 他也表示，计划明年召开第二届全球“民主峰会 ” 。
tgt: He also said that the second global “Summit for Democracy” was scheduled to be held next year.
hypo: He also stated that the second global "Democracy Summit" will be held next year.

src: 台湾政府代表、政务委员唐凤和目前流亡英国的香港民主人权活动人士罗冠聪也在第二天的峰会上发言。
