src: 根据保险监管部门的定义，互联网保险就是投保人点击投保链接后，可以自主完成所有的投保流程的保险业务。
tgt: According to the definition of insurance supervising departments, Internet insurance is an insurance business in which the applicant can complete the entire insurance process independently after clicking the insuring link.
hypo: According to the definition of the insurance regulation department, Internet insurance is a type of insurance business where the applicant can complete all the insurance procedures by clicking the insurance link.

src: 在这个过程中，投保人不需要签字，保险顾问也不需要签字，所有步骤全部都可以由投保人自主完成。
tgt: In this process, neither the applicant nor the insurance consultant needs to sign, so all the steps can be fulfilled independently by the applicant.
hypo: In this process, the insurance consultant is not required to sign, and all steps can be completed independently by the insured.

src: 虽然互联网保险的投保没太有“仪式感”，甚至可能连打印版的纸质合同都没有，但是这丝毫不影响电子版合同的有效性与法律效力。
tgt: Although insuring an Internet insurance product has no “sense of ritual”, and even there is no printed copy of contact, it doesn’t affect the validity and legal effect of electronic contract at all.
hypo: Although the insurance coverage of the Internet is not very "ceremonial", and even the printed paper contract may not exist, but this does not affect the validity and legal effect of the electronic contract at all.

src: 这种模式，有点类似于“电话销售”一般的流水线作业，但如此购买保险也会有一个致命的问题，那就是——后续的服务可能会跟不上。
tgt: This pattern is somewhat similar to assembly line operation of “telemarketing”, but buying insurance this way will also have a fatal problem, that is, the follow-up service may not keep up.
hypo: This model is somewhat similar to the usual flow of telephone sales, but buying insurance also has a fatal problem, that is, the follow-up service may not be up to par.

src: 保险通常是一份长达几十年的长期契约，我们在购买保险的时候，是不是应该认真思考一下，我们所选择的这个“中介”，是不是一个可以与我们长期相伴、在很多年后也会给我们提供服务的“保险中介人”呢？
tgt: Insurance is usually a long-term contract that lasts for decades; when we buy insurance, shouldn’t we seriously consider whether the “intermediary” we choose is an “insurance intermediary” who can accompany us for a long time and provide services to us many years later?
hypo: Insurance is usually a long-term contract that lasts for several decades. When we purchase insurance, we should seriously consider whether the "intermediary" we have chosen is a "insurance intermediary" who can accompany us for a long time and provide services for us in many years to come.

src: 从以前到现在，我都反对任何形式的污蔑和谩骂，更不能接受这类人身攻击的行为。
tgt: I have been against any form of insult or abuse since the beginning, and I will not stand such personal attacks.
hypo: From the past to the present, I have always opposed any form of defamation and abuse, and I cannot tolerate such personal attacks.

src: 在文明社会，我们可以包容一切，但就是要杜绝这种恶棍。
tgt: In this civilized society, we can tolerate everything, but we need to get rid of these bullies.
hypo: In a civilized society, we can tolerate everything, but we must eliminate this scourge.

src: 如果不看政党和派系，要先抵制的，就是这种不文明的作风。
tgt: If you don’t look at political parties and factions, it is this uncivilized actions that should be boycotted first.
hypo: If we don't look at political parties and factions, the first thing to resist is this uncivilized behavior.

src: 从你开始发来脸书加好友请求开始，进而发表具调侃性的帖子，再到你试图把所谓我的家地点和父亲名字发布在社交媒体上，我都已经采取不回应的态度。
tgt: I never replied to you since you started to send me Facebook friend request, published ridicule posts, and then tried to post the so-called location of my home and my father’s name on social media.
hypo: Since you started sending friend requests on Facebook, publishing provocative posts, and attempting to publish my so-called location and father's name on social media, I have taken an unresponsive attitude.

src: 你过后变本加厉地不只按一日六餐的频率持续tag我，更在脸书跟你的所谓朋友们继续肆无忌惮地讨论着关于我一些隐晦、羞辱的言论，样貌、身材、好生养、又什么床上种草莓、要不要插之类的留言，我...也算了。
tgt: After that, you made it worse by not only continuing to tag me six times a day, but also continuing to wantonly discuss with your so-called friends on Facebook about some obscure and humiliating remarks about me, my appearance, figure, shape fit for giving birth, getting love bites in bed, whether to penetrate or not, I... forget it.
hypo: So-called friends, I've been relentlessly tagged by you for continuously discussing some embarrassing and humiliating remarks about me on Facebook with your so-called friends. It's okay.

src: 怎知后来我更收到多位朋友发来有关你的脸书朋友户口上载一张你的照片和具性骚扰成分的言论。
tgt: It was unexpected that more people sent me a photo uploaded to your Facebook friends page and your harassing comments.
hypo: How did I know that later on, many of my friends would send me messages on my Facebook friend's page, uploading a photo and making inappropriate comments about me?

src: 抱歉，作为一位女生，我再也无法继续沉默了。
tgt: Sorry, I cannot be silent anymore as a girl.
hypo: Sorry, as a girl, I can't keep quiet anymore.

src: 我报警的新闻上载后，你完全没有收敛，反而更越发嚣张。
tgt: After the news of me calling the police was published, you did not restrain yourself at all, but became more arrogant.
hypo: After I reported the news, you didn't calm down at all, but instead became more and more agitated, calling the police.

src: 我不理你是什么政治背景，也不管你是什么身份地位，在我们的社会，是需要两性尊重的。
tgt: I don’t care about your political background or your identity or position; in our society, the two genders shall respect each other.
hypo: Regardless of political background or identity status, gender respect is necessary in our society.

src: 是的，你们可以继续这种具调侃性、隐晦、羞辱、辱骂的言论，你也可以继续说你只是关爱和关注我，你可以继续认为这并不是骚扰、你甚至可以继续否认那不是你制的图或者继续发表一切攻击性言论。
tgt: Yes, you can continue with your ridicule, obscure, humiliating and abusive remarks; you can continue to say that you just care about and pay attention to me; you can continue to think that this is not harassment; you can even continue to deny that you made the pictures or continue to make all the offensive remarks.
hypo: Yes, you can even continue with this provocative, evasive, humiliating, and abusive language, you can continue to say that you only care and are concerned about me, you can even continue to deny that it is harassment, and you can even continue to post all attacking comments.

src: 没错，我不能，也没有能力阻止你们。
tgt: Yes, I can’t and won’t stop you.
hypo: That's right, I can't and I don't have the ability to stop you.

src: 我既不认识你，也不想认识你，我的样貌和身材更不需要你评头论足。
tgt: I don’t know you and I don’t want to know you, and my appearance and body don’t need you judgement.
hypo: I don't know you and I don't want to know you, my appearance and physique don't need your judgment or comment.

src: 我甚至不认为会有哪一位女生愿意让别人如此地羞辱自己来换来出名。
tgt: I don’t even think any girl would want to be famous by being humiliated like this.
hypo: I don't even think any girl would be willing to be so humiliated by others just to be famous.

src: 朋友问我，还好吗？
tgt: My friends asked me if I was okay.
hypo: My friend asked me, "How are you doing?"

src: 我说好，你也不会信。
tgt: You won’t believe it if I say yes.
hypo: If I tell you, you won't believe me.

src: 我觉得不会有任何一位女生被如此霸凌后还可以说自己还好。
tgt: I don’t think any girl could say they are okay after being bullied like this.
hypo: I don't think any girl could say they're okay after being treated like that.

src: 无论在工作、社会、政坛或商界，只有那些连基本品德都没有的人，才会选择用这种方式来伤害任何一位女性。
tgt: No matter it’s in the workplace, society, politics or the business world, only those without basic moral character will harm a woman in this way.
hypo: Only those who lack basic moral values will choose to harm any woman using this method, whether in the workplace, society, politics, or business.

src: 我相信，公道自在人心。
tgt: I believe justice is in everyone’s heart.
hypo: I believe that honesty is natural in everyone's heart.

src: 我截了部分留言给大家评理
tgt: I took screenshots of part of the comments and you can make your judgement.
hypo: I left some comments for everyone to check out.

src: 你自己发的贴应该没有人可以冒充你了吧
tgt: You posted it yourself, and no one will pretend to be you, right?
hypo: No one will pretend to have sent the post you sent.

src: 我只能说你是文明的公敌
tgt: I can only say you’re the enemy of civilization.
hypo: I can only say that you are the public enemy of civilization.

src: 会心一笑
tgt: Smile
hypo: Make sure to include these words: Smile

src: 美三航母集结中国周边 最强大武器罕见访问关岛 2022-01-17 多维 亲中共媒体多维报道：中美关系最新消息：最新卫星图像显示，美国三艘航母正在中国周边集结；美媒还披露，美国海军武器库中最强大的武器之一罕见访问关岛，对印太地区美国的盟友与敌手释放重要信号。
tgt: Three US aircraft carriers assemble around China; the most powerful weapons visit Guam in rare situation 2022-01-17 multidimensional Pro Communist media multidimensionally reports: latest news on China US Relation: the latest satellite image showed that three US aircraft carriers are assembling around China; US media also disclosed that one of the most powerful weapons in the US Navy’s arsenal in a rare case visited Guam, and sent an important signal to US allies and enemies in the Indo-Pacific region.
hypo: According to the latest satellite images, three US aircraft carriers are gathering around China. The US media also revealed that one of the strongest weapons in the US arsenal, which is stored in a US naval weapons depot, is rare to visit Guam, which sends a significant signal to US allies and enemies in the Indo-Pacific region.

src: 据中国智库“南海战略态势感知平台”消息，1月9日，卫星在巴拉巴克海峡附近发现了美军“卡尔·文森”号（USS Carl Vinson）航母。
tgt: According to Chinese think-tank “South China Sea Strategic Situation Detection Platform”, on January 9, the satellite found the USS Carl Vinson aircraft carrier from the US army near the Balabac Strait.
hypo: According to a report by the Chinese think-tank "Nanhai Strategic Intelligence Platform," on January 9, a satellite found the USS Carl Vinson aircraft carrier in the vicinity of the Balabac Strait.

src: 巴拉巴克海峡连通南海和苏禄海，是西太平洋第一岛链上的战略要地。
tgt: Connecting the South China Sea and Sulu Sea, the Balabac Strait is a strategic place on the first island chain in the Western Pacific.
hypo: The Balabac Strait connects the South China Sea and the Sulu Sea, making it a strategic location on the first island chain in the Western Pacific.

src: 该平台预计，“卡尔·文森”号将前往南海部署。
tgt: The platform predicts that Carl Vinson will do deployment at the South China Sea.
hypo: The platform predicts that Carl Vinson will be deployed to the South China Sea.

src: 这是“卡尔·文森”号航母首次搭载F-35C战斗机和CMV-22“鱼鹰”舰载运输机进行部署。
tgt: This will be the first time that Carl Vinson carries F-35C fighter and CMV-22 Osprey carrier transport aircraft to do the deployment.
hypo: This is the first time that the USS Carl Vinson has deployed F-35C fighter jets and CMV-22 "Flying Fish" transport aircraft.

src: 现在正在太平洋上游弋的美军航母，除了“卡尔·文森”号外，还有1月3日从美国出发的“亚伯拉罕·林肯”号（USS Abraham Lincoln）航母。
tgt: In addition to Carl Vinson, the US aircraft carriers cruising in the Pacific Ocean now also include the USS Abraham Lincoln, which departed from the United States on January 3.
hypo: Now, the US Navy aircraft carrier USS Abraham Lincoln, which departed from the US on January 3, has joined the USS Carl Vinson in the Pacific.

src: “林肯”号也首次搭载了F-35C舰载机中队，该中队隶属美国海军陆战队的第314战斗机攻击中队。
tgt: USS Abraham Lincoln also carried the F-35C carrier based aircraft squadron for the first time, which belongs to the 314th Fighter Attack Squadron of the US Marine Corps.
hypo: Marine Corps

src: 除了上述两艘航母外，目前美国海军部署在亚太地区的还有停靠在日本横须贺的“里根”号（USS Ronald Reagan）航母。
tgt: Apart from the above two aircraft carriers, the US Navy currently also deploys the USS Ronald Reagan aircraft carrier, which is docked in Yokosuka, Japan, in the Asia Pacific region.
hypo: In addition to the two aircraft carriers mentioned above, the US Navy's USS Ronald Reagan, which is stationed in Yokosuka, Japan, is also deployed in the Asia-Pacific region.

src: 航母战斗群中还包括“尚普兰湖”号导弹巡洋舰、“斯托克达尔”号导弹驱逐舰等。
tgt: The aircraft carrier battle group also includes the missile cruiser “Champlain Lake” and guided missile destroyer “Stockdale”.
hypo: The aircraft carrier battle group also includes the missile cruiser "Shanghai Lake" and the missile frigate "Stockholm".

src: 美三航母集结中国周边 最强大武器罕见访问关岛 2022年1月17日，“南海战略态势感知平台”公布最新卫星图片，显示美军三艘航母正在中国周边集结。
tgt: Three US aircraft carriers are assembling around China; the most powerful weapon paid a visit to Guam in a rare case; on January 17, 2022, the “South China Sea Strategic Situation Detection Platform” released the latest satellite images, showing that three US aircraft carriers are assembling around China.
hypo: On January 17, 2022, the "South China Sea Strategic Situation Sensing Platform" released the latest satellite images, showing that three US aircraft carriers were gathering in the vicinity of China.

src: （微博@南海战略态势感知） 美三航母集结中国周边 最强大武器罕见访问关岛 2022年1月17日，美军舰载运输机CMV-22B飞行路线。
tgt: (Weibo @SouthChinaSeaStrategicSituationDetection) three US aircraft carriers assembled around China; the most powerful weapon paid a visit to Guam in a rare case; on January 17, 2022, the flight route of the US carrier-borne transport aircraft CMV-22B.
hypo: Weibo@南海战略态势感知) 美三航母集结中国周边 最强大武器罕见访问关岛 2022年1月17日，美军舰载运输机CMV-22B飞行路线。

src: （微博@南海战略态势感知） 另据美国有线电视新闻网（CNN）1月17日报道，美国海军武器库中最强大的武器之一上周末罕见地访问了关岛。
tgt: (Weibo @SouthChinaSeaStrategicSituationDetection) According to report of CNN on January 17, one of the most powerful weapons in the US Navy arsenal paid a visit to Guam in a rare case.
hypo: According to a report by US cable news network CNN on January 17, one of the most powerful weapons in the US Navy weapons depot made a rare visit to Guam last weekend.

src: 载有20枚三叉戟（Trident）弹道导弹和数十枚核弹头的俄亥俄级核潜艇“内华达号”（USS Nevada）上周六（1月15日）驶入美国关岛海军基地。
tgt: The Ohio class nuclear submarine USS Nevada, which carries 20 Trident ballistic missiles and dozens of nuclear warheads, entered the US naval base in Guam last Saturday (January 15).
hypo: The Russian nuclear submarine "Nevada" carrying 20 Trident ballistic missiles and dozens of nuclear warheads entered the US naval base in Guam last Saturday (January 15).

src: 美三航母集结中国周边 最强大武器罕见访问关岛 分析称，这是向印度-太平洋地区日益紧张的局势中的盟友和敌人发出了一个信号。
tgt: Three US aircraft carriers are assembling around China; the most powerful weapon paid a visit to Guam in a rare case; according to analysis, this is a signal to allies and enemies in the increasingly tense situation in the Indo-Pacific region.
hypo: The US Navy's three aircraft carriers have gathered in the waters around China, making a rare visit to Guam. Analysts believe that this is a signal sent to allies and enemies in the increasingly tense situation in the Indo-Pacific region.

src: 这是美国弹道导弹潜艇自2016年以来首次访问关岛，也是自20世纪80年代以来第二次公开访问关岛。
tgt: This is the first visit to Guam by a US ballistic missile submarine since 2016 and the second public visit to Guam since the 1980s.
hypo: This is the first visit to Guam by a US ballistic missile submarine since 2016, and the second public visit since the 1980s.

src: 美三航母集结中国周边 最强大武器罕见访问关岛 中国近年来在南沙群岛修建大批军事设施。
tgt: Three US aircraft carriers are assembling around China; the most powerful weapon paid a visit to Guam in a rare case; China has built a large number of military facilities in the Nansha Islands in recent years.
hypo: China has built a lot of military facilities in Guam in recent years.

src: 图为中国在南沙群岛的永暑岛。
tgt: The picture shows China’s Yongshu Island in the Nansha Islands.
hypo: The map shows China's permanent presence in the Spratly Islands.

src: （南海研究论坛） 美国海军在声明中称，俄亥俄级核潜艇“内华达号”此次对关岛的访问加强了美国和该地区盟友之间的合作，展示了美国的能力、灵活性、战备状态，以及对印太地区安全与稳定的持续承诺。
tgt: (South China Sea Research Forum) the U.S. Navy said in a statement that the visit of the Ohio class nuclear submarine “Nevada” to Guam strengthened the cooperation between the US and its allies in the region, demonstrated the ability, flexibility, combat readiness of the US, as well as its continued commitment to security and stability in the Indo-Pacific region.
hypo: In its statement, the US Navy said that Russia's nuclear submarine "Narwhal" visit to Guam has strengthened cooperation between the US and its regional allies, demonstrated US capability, flexibility, readiness, and continued commitment to security and stability in the Indo-Pacific region.

src: 弹道导弹潜艇通常被称为“雷鸣潜艇”（Boomer submarine）。
tgt: Ballistic missile submarines are often called “Boomer submarines”.
hypo: Ballistic missile submarines are usually referred to as "Boomer submarines."

src: 美国海军舰队中14艘“雷鸣潜艇”的行踪通常是被严格保密的。
tgt: The whereabouts of the 14 “Boomer Submarines” in the US Navy fleet are usually strictly confidential.
hypo: The whereabouts of 14 "Boomer Submarines" in the US Navy is usually kept strictly confidential.

src: 围绕着弹道导弹潜艇的秘密使“雷鸣潜艇”成为“核三位一体中最重要的生存武器”，这一体系还包括位于美国本土的发射井弹道导弹，以及B-2和B-52等可携带核弹头的轰炸机。
tgt: The secret surrounding ballistic missile submarines makes “Boomer Submarine" the “most important survival weapon in the Nuclear Trinity”; this system also includes launching silo ballistic missile located in the US, as well as bombers such as B-2 and B-52 that can carry nuclear warheads.
hypo: The secret of the ballistic missile submarine made the "Boomer Submarine" become the most important survival weapon among the nuclear triad. The system also includes the ballistic missile silos located in the United States, as well as bombers such as B-2 and B-52 that can carry nuclear warheads.

src: 跟朋友聊起最近Meta大跌 26%，市值蒸发 2510 亿美元，扎克伯格回应「面临前所未有的竞争」，原因为何？
tgt: I talked to my friend about the recent 26% plunge in Meta and its loss of US $251 billion in market value; Zuckerberg responded that he was “facing unprecedented competition”; why?
hypo: Facing unprecedented competition, Meta lost 26% of its value and its market capitalization evaporated by $251 billion. Why did Zuckerberg respond?

src: Meta（原 Facebook）实质是一家广告公司，收入主要来自于广告，今时今日赚钱的广告公司，自己是有流量渠道的。
tgt: Meta (formerly Facebook) is essentially an advertising company, whose revenue mainly comes from advertising; the advertising company that makes money today has its own channel for traffic.
hypo: Meta, formerly Facebook, is essentially an advertising company. Its revenue mainly comes from advertising, and it is a company with a flow channel.

src: Facebook，Instagram，Whatsapp 等等，无论什么样的功能定位，都是 Meta 的流量渠道。
tgt: Regardless of its function positioning, Facebook, Instagram, Whatsapp, etc. are all channels of traffic for Meta.
hypo: Facebook, Instagram, Whatsapp, etc. are all traffic channels for Meta.

src: 不仅如此，Meta 还是最大的”广告联盟”,很多 App 外接 Meta 的广告，通过 Meta 的广告平台是实现变现。
tgt: Not only that, Meta is also the biggest “advertisement alliance”; Many apps are externally connected to Meta’s advertising, and they achieve realization through Meta’s advertising platform.
hypo: Not only that, but Meta is also the largest advertisement alliance. Many apps externalize their advertisements to Meta and achieve profit through Meta's advertising platform.

src: 但是，时代变了。
tgt: But, the time has changed.
hypo: However, times have changed.

src: 第一，因为苹果隐私政策的调整，Meta 很难再拿到用户的数据信息，影响了广告投放的效率。
tgt: First, due to the adjustment of Apple’s privacy policy, it is difficult for Meta to get users’ data information now, which affects the efficiency of advertising.
hypo: Firstly, due to the adjustment of Apple's privacy policy, it is difficult for Meta to get users' data information, which affects the efficiency of advertisement placement.

src: 苹果现在的隐私政策对用户很友好，会很明显的提示用户是否允许 App 获取自己的信息，大多数人的正常反应肯定是不允许。
tgt: Apple’s current privacy policy is very user-friendly; it will use explicit prompt to ask users whether they allow apps to access their own information; most people’s normal reaction is definitely not to allow it.
hypo: Apple's current privacy policy is user-friendly and clearly indicates whether an app is allowed to access a user's information. Most people's normal response is to not allow apps to access their information.

src: 接下来如果 Google 再捅一刀，对 Meta 的收入影响还会更大。
tgt: If Google stabs again next, it will have a greater impact on Meta’s revenue.
hypo: Next, if Google does it again, the impact on Meta's revenue will be even greater.

src: 第二，以前 Meta 的收入增长里的中国因素也弱化了（这个因素的比重不确定有多高，但确实存在）。
tgt: Second, the Chinese factor in Meta’s revenue growth has also been weakened (the proportion of this factor is uncertain, but it does exist).
hypo: Secondly, the Chinese factor that contributed to Meta's revenue growth in the past has weakened (the proportion of this factor is uncertain, but it does exist).

src: 大家平时都知道 Meta 在中国是没有业务的，但是这个理解并不准确。
tgt: We all know that Meta doesn’t have business in China, but this understanding is not accurate.
hypo: We all know that Meta does not have business in China, but this understanding is not accurate.

src: 每年 Meta 至少10%的收入都来自中国，主要是中国做出海业务的公司贡献的。
tgt: At least 10% of Meta’s revenue comes from China every year, mainly contributed by Chinese companies engaged in offshore business.
hypo: Every year, at least 10% of Meta's revenue comes from China, mainly from companies that contribute to China's maritime business.

src: Meta 在香港的办公室大概几百人，在大陆还有几大代理商。
tgt: There are around hundreds of staff at its Hong Kong office and several major agents in the mainland.
hypo: Meta's Hong Kong office has around 500 staff, with several agents on the mainland.

src: 中国公司想要拓展海外市场，Meta 都是绕不过的广告渠道，烧的钱大多都给了 Meta。
tgt: When Chinese companies want to expand overseas market, Meta is an advertising channel that cannot be bypassed, and so most of the money is given to Meta.
hypo: Companies want to expand their overseas market, and Meta is the only advertising channel they can't afford to ignore.

src: 有意思的是，现在字节的 TT 是 Meta 主要的竞争对手之一，但是前两年 Meta 从字节身上可赚到不少钱。
tgt: Interestingly, the TT of ByteDance now is one of Meta’s main competitors, but Meta made a lot of money from ByteDance in the past two years.
hypo: Interestingly, TT of ByteDance is now one of the main competitors of Meta, but in the past two years, ByteDance made a lot of money from TT.

src: 国内各个代理都在帮字节去 Meta 那里投广告，Meta 大中华区的业绩也很不错。
tgt: All domestic agents are helping ByteDance to do advertising at Meta, and Meta’s performance in Greater China is also very good.
hypo: The performance of Meta in the Chinese market is very good. ByteDance is also very good.

src: 最近我没有专门去了解，但是肯定不会比之前好。
tgt: I haven’t specifically learned about it recently, but it’s definitely not better than before.
hypo: I haven't specifically looked into it recently, but it definitely won't be better than before.

src: 中国公司在海外大规模烧钱的阶段已经过去了。
tgt: The stage when Chinese companies were burning money overseas on a large scale has passed.
hypo: The era of Chinese companies burning money overseas has passed.

src: 第三，新的流量渠道拓展不顺利。
tgt: Third, the expansion of new traffic channels is not smooth.
hypo: Thirdly, the expansion of new traffic channels is not smooth.

src: Facebook 越来越老了，新的包括 TT 在内的平台，都不在 Meta 手中。
tgt: Facebook is getting older, and new platforms including TT is not in the hands of Meta.
hypo: Facebook is getting older, and new platforms including TT are not in Meta's hands.

src: 最大的问题不仅仅是收入下滑，而是缺乏增长预期。
tgt: The biggest problem is not the decline of revenue but lack of growth expectation.
hypo: The biggest problem is not only the decline in income, but also the lack of expected growth.

src: 资本市场不仅仅看中收入，更重要的是看未来的预期怎么样。
tgt: The capital market not only focuses on income; more importantly, it depends on future expectations.
hypo: The capital market is not just about China's income, but more importantly about the future expectations.

src: 很显然，Meta 的预期是不够的。
tgt: Obviously, the expectation for Meta is not enough.
hypo: It is quite obvious that the expectation for Meta is not enough.

src: 为了给市场讲出新的故事，扎克伯格讲了 “元宇宙”.
tgt: In order to tell new stories to the market, Zuckerberg told the story about “Meta-universe”.
hypo: In order to tell the market a new story, Zuckerberg told the "multiverse".

src: 元宇宙确实应该是未来的方向之一，但是元宇宙的实现周期比较长，这个故事在这两三年应该不足以支撑起 Meta 的市值。
tgt: Meta-universe indeed should be one of the future directions, but the period of the realization of Meta-universe is long, and this story is not sufficient to support the market value of Meta.
hypo: The Meta-universe should indeed be one of the future directions, but the realization cycle of the Meta-universe is relatively long. This story should not be enough to support Meta's market capitalization in the next three to five years.

src: 所以未来这两年，应该是 Meta 比较艰难的时期。
tgt: Therefore, the next two years should be a difficult time for Meta.
hypo: Therefore, the next two years should be a more challenging period for Meta.

src: 别看脸书现在非常的风光，每年也有1,000亿到2,000亿美元的收入，实际上脸书现在危机感非常强，跟其他的互联网企业和高科技公司相比，没有什么好的安全的护城河。
tgt: Although Facebook is very popular now with an annual income of US $100 billion to $200 billion; in fact, Facebook has a strong sense of crisis; compared with other Internet companies and high-tech companies, there is not any good security moat.
hypo: Don't look now, but Facebook is in a bit of a pickle. The social media giant brings in anywhere from $10 billion to $20 billion in annual revenue, but in reality, it's in a crisis. Unlike other internet companies and high-tech firms, Facebook doesn't have a good security moat.

src: 虽然他的几款社交软件现在的日活比较高，也是主流的社交软件，比如Facebook，WhatsApp等等，但是面对tiktok的快速发展，脸书也没有什么信心，颠覆之间也就是眨眼的功夫。
tgt: Although the DAU of several of his social software is relatively high, and they are mainstream social software such as Facebook, WhatsApp; however, in the face of the rapid development of TikTok, Facebook has little confidence, and subversion could happen in the blink of an eye.
hypo: Although his several social media apps have high daily active users and are mainstream social software, such as Facebook and WhatsApp, facing the rapid development of TikTok, Facebook has no confidence and is only a matter of time.

src: 而搞元宇宙这个可望而不可及的概念，短时间之内完全没有成功的希望，因此脸书非常的危险，这也是为什么扎克伯格又是换公司的名字，又是不停的寻找新的赛道的根本原因，但是我觉得他的赛道选择是错的，是一条不归路 以上是我的一些思考，供参考。
tgt: The unattainable concept of meta universe has no hope of success in a short time, so Facebook is in danger; this is also the fundamental reason why Zuckerberg changed the name of the company and kept looking for new tracks, but I think his choice is wrong and there is no way back; the above is some of my thoughts for reference.
hypo: While the concept of intergalactic travel is a desirable yet unattainable one, there is little hope for success within a short period of time. Therefore, Facebook is extremely risky, which is also the reason why Zuckerberg changed his name and is constantly searching for new avenues. However, I think his choice of path is wrong and is a one-way street. Here are some of my thoughts for reference.

src: 第十七条 国家对注册消防工程师资格实行注册执业管理制度。
tgt: Article 17 The state implements the registration and practice management system for the qualification of certified Fire Engineers.
hypo: Article 17: The state implements a registration and practice management system for registered fire protection engineers.

src: 取得一级、二级注册消防工程师资格证书的人员，经注册方可以相应级别注册消防工程师名义执业。
tgt: People who obtained the Level 1 and Level 2 qualification certificates of registered Fire Engineers can practice in the name of registered Fire Engineers of corresponding level.
hypo: Individuals who have obtained a certificate of qualification for first- and second-level registered fire protection engineers can be registered as fire protection engineers by the registration authority.

src: 第十八条 公安部消防局是一级注册消防工程师资格的注册审批部门。
tgt: Article 18 The Fire Department of the Ministry of Public Security is the registration and approval department of the qualification of Level 1 registered Fire Engineer.
hypo: Article 18: The Fire Protection Bureau of the Ministry of Public Security is a registration and approval department for the registration of fire protection engineers.

src: 省、自治区、直辖市公安机关消防机构为二级注册消防工程师资格的注册审批部门，并负责一级注册消防工程师资格注册的初步审查工作。
tgt: The fire departments of the public security organs of provinces, autonomous regions and municipalities directly under the Central Government are the registration and approval departments for the qualification of Level 2 registered Fire Engineers, and are responsible for the preliminary review of the qualification of registration of Level 1 registered Fire Engineers.
hypo: The Provincial, Autonomous Region, and Directly Governed City Public Security Bureau Fire Department is the registration approval department for Level 2 registered firefighter qualifications, and is responsible for the initial review of Level 1 registered firefighter qualifications.

src: 第十九条 取得一级、二级注册消防工程师资格证书并申请注册的人员，应当受聘于一个经批准的消防技术服务机构或者消防安全重点单位，并通过聘用单位向本单位所在地(聘用单位属企业的，通过本企业向工商注册所在地)的公安机关消防机构提交注册申请材料。
tgt: Article 19 A person who has obtained the qualification certificate of Level 1 and Level 2 registered Fire Engineer and applies for registration shall be employed by an approved fire protection technical service institution or key fire safety unit, and the employer shall submit registration application materials to the fire protection institution of the public security organ in the place where the employer is located (if the employer is an enterprise, it shall be submitted to the place where the industrial and commercial registration is located).
hypo: Article 19 stipulates that those who have obtained the first- and second-level registration certificates for fire protection engineers and applied for registration shall be employed by an approved fire protection technology service agency or a fire safety key unit, and shall submit the registration application materials to the public security organ of the employing unit (if the employing unit is the enterprise, then to the public security organ of the enterprise).

src: 第二十条 省、自治区、直辖市公安机关消防机构在收到申请人的注册申请材料后，对申请材料不齐全或者不符合法定形式的，应当当场或者在5个工作日内，一次 性告知申请人需要补正的全部内容，逾期不告知的，自收到申请材料之日起即为受理。
tgt: Article 20 After receiving the registration application materials of the applicant, the fire protection institutions of the public security organs of provinces, autonomous regions and municipalities directly under the central government shall inform the applicant of all the contents that need to be supplemented and corrected all at once on the spot or within 5 working days if the application materials are incomplete or do not conform to the legal form; if they fail to inform within the time limit, they will be accepted from the date of receiving the application materials.
hypo: Article 20: Provincial, autonomous region, and direct-controlled municipal public security fire protection bureaus shall, within 5 working days after receiving an applicant's registration application materials, notify the applicant of any incomplete or non-compliant information in the application materials. Failure to do so within the time limit shall be deemed to have been received.

src: 对受理或者不予受理的注册申请，均应当出具加盖本级公安机关消防机构专用印章和注明日期的书面凭证。
tgt: For the registration applications that are accepted or rejected, a written certificate stamped with the special seal of the fire protection institution of the public security organ at the same level and date shall be issued.
hypo: Registration applications that are accepted or rejected shall be accompanied by a written certification with the stamp and date of the issuing public security organ fire department.

src: 第二十一条 省、自治区、直辖市公安机关消防机构自受理注册申请之日起20个工作日内，按规定条件和程序完成一级注册消防工程师资格注册申请材料的初步审查工作和二级注册消防工程师资格的注册审批工作，并将一级注册消防工程师资格注册申请材料和初步审查意见报公安部消防局审批。
tgt: Article 21 The fire protection institutions of the public security organs of provinces, autonomous regions and municipalities directly under the central government shall, within 20 working days after the date of accepting the registration application, complete the preliminary review of the application materials for the registration of the Level 1 registered Fire Engineer qualification and the registration and approval of the Level 2 registered Fire Engineer qualification according to the specified conditions and procedures, and submit the application materials for the registration of the Level 1 registered Fire Engineer qualification and the preliminary review opinions to the Fire Department of the Ministry of Public Security for approval.
hypo: Article 21: Provincial, autonomous region, and directly administered city public security bureau fire protection agencies shall complete the initial review of the registration of fire protection engineers within 20 working days from the date of acceptance of the registration application. They shall also complete the registration of fire protection engineer qualifications and the initial review of the registration of fire protection engineers within 20 working days from the date of acceptance of the registration application, and shall report the initial review opinions to the public security bureau for approval.

src: 公安部消防局应当自收到省级公安机关消防机构报送的申请材料和初步审查意见之日起，20个工作日内作出是否批准的决定。
tgt: The Fire Department of the Ministry of Public Security shall make a decision on whether to approve or not within 20 working days from the date of receiving the application materials and preliminary review opinions submitted by the Fire Department of the provincial public security organ.
hypo: The Fire Department should make a decision within 20 working days from the date of receiving the application materials and preliminary review opinions from the provincial public security fire department.

src: 在规定的期限内不能作出批准决定的，应当将延长的期限和理由告知申请人。
tgt: If the approval decision cannot be made within the prescribed time limit, the applicant shall be informed of the extended time limit and the reason.
hypo: If the approval shall not be made within the stipulated period, the extended period and reasons shall be notified to the applicant.

src: 对作出不予批准决定的，应当书面说明理由，并告知申请人享有依法申请行政复议或者提起行政诉讼的权利。
tgt: If the decision of disapproval is made, the reasons shall be explained in writing, and the applicant shall be informed of the right to apply for administrative reconsideration or file an administrative lawsuit according to law.
hypo: If a decision is made not to approve an application, the reasons should be stated in writing and the applicant should be informed of their right to apply for, or file an administrative appeal or lawsuit under the law.

src: 第二十二条 注册审批部门应当自作出批准决定之日起10个工作日内，颁发、送达相应级别的注册证。
tgt: Article 22 The registration review and approval department shall issue and deliver the registration certificate of the corresponding level within 10 working days from the date of making the approval decision.
hypo: Article 22: The registration approval department shall issue and deliver the registration certificate within 10 working days of making the approval decision.

src: 第二十三条 注册证的每一注册有效期为3年。
tgt: Article 23 The period of validity is 3 years for each registration period of the registration certificate.
hypo: Article 23: The validity period of each registration certificate is 3 years.

src: 注册证在有效期内是相应级别注册消防工程师的执业凭证，由注册消防工程师本人保管、使用。
tgt: The registration certificate is the practicing certificate of the registered Fire Engineer of the corresponding level within the period of validity, which is kept and used by the registered Fire Engineer themselves.
hypo: The registration certificate is a professional license for fire protection engineers at the corresponding level, which is issued and managed by the registered fire protection engineer himself.

src: 第二十四条 申请初始注册的，应当自取得一级、二级注册消防工程师资格证书之日起1年内提出申请。
tgt: Article 24 Initial registration shall be applied within 1 year from the date of obtaining the qualification certificate of Level 1 and Level 2 registered Fire Engineer.
hypo: Article 24: Applicants for initial registration shall submit an application within one year from the date of obtaining a certificate of qualification as a registered fire protection engineer.

src: 逾期申请初始注册时，须符合本规定继续教育要求。
tgt: When applying for initial registration beyond the time limit, it must meet the requirements on continuing education in this Regulation.
hypo: When applying for a late initial registration, the applicant must comply with the requirements for continued education.

src: 初始注册、延续注册、变更注册、注销注册和不予注册等注册管理的具体办法，由公安部另行规定。
tgt: The specific measures for registration administration of initial registration, continuation of registration, change of registration, cancellation of registration and not-approved registration shall be separately formulated by the Ministry of Public Security.
hypo: The specific methods for initial registration, renewal registration, change of registration, cancellation of registration, and non-registration are stipulated by the Ministry of Public Security.

src: 第二十五条 继续教育是注册消防工程师延续注册、重新注册和逾期初始注册的必备条件。
tgt: Article 25 Continuation of Education is a necessary condition for the continuation of registration, re-registration and overdue initial registration of registered Fire Engineers.
hypo: Article 25: Continuing education is a prerequisite for re-registration and overdue initial registration of fire protection engineers.

src: 在每个注册有效期内，各级别注册消防工程师应当按照规定完成相应的继续教育。
tgt: Within the period of validity of each registration, registered Fire Engineer of different levels shall complete the corresponding continuation of education according to the regulations.
hypo: During each registration period, firefighters at all levels should complete the required continuing education according to regulations.

src: 第二十六条 注册审批部门应当及时向社会公告注册消防工程师注册有关情况，建立注册消防工程师诚信档案，对其执业活动实行信用管理。
tgt: Article 26 The registration review and approval department shall timely announce the registration of registered Fire Engineers to the public, establish the integrity archives of registered Fire Engineers, and implement credit management on their practices.
hypo: Article 26: The registration review department shall timely announce to the public the registration of firefighters, establish a credible record of registered firefighters, and exercise credit management over their professional activities.

src: 第二十七条 各级注册消防工程师资格的注册管理部门，应当严格执行《中华人民共和国行政许可法》有关规定。
tgt: Article 27 The registration administration departments for the qualification of registered Fire Engineers at all levels shall strictly implement the relevant provisions of the Administrative License Law of the people’s Republic of China.
hypo: Make sure to include these words: Law of

src: 今日的考试资讯分享到此为止，希望能给大家一些帮助。
tgt: This is the end of the sharing of today’s examination information; I hope this will be helpful to you.
hypo: Sharing of today's exam information is up to this point, hoping to give everyone some help.

src: 大家一定要努力备考，争取早日通过消防工程师考试！
tgt: Everyone, please work hard on this and hopefully you will pass the Fire Engineer examination soon!
hypo: Everyone must study hard to pass the Fire Engineer exam!

src: 实时分享金融/财会/建筑最新考试资讯。
tgt: Real time sharing of the latest examination information of Finance/ Accounting/Architecture.
hypo: Share the latest exam information on finance, accounting, and construction.
